[\[122a.3\]]ba'i dper 'gyur ro/_/gal te thams cad kyi nang du khyod kyi tshig bsdus so zhe na/_dngos po thams cad stong pa yin pas des na de yang stong pa yin no/_/de'i phyir 'dis 'gog pa med do/_/gal te stong pa yin yang dngos po thams cad ni stong pa'o zhes 'dis 'gog pa yod
[\[122a.4\]]do zhe na/_des na dngos po thams cad stong pa yin yang bya ba byed nus par 'gyur te de ni 'dod pa ma yin no/_/gal te 'gal ba'i dper gyur nas mi rung ngo snyam nas dngos po thams cad stong pa yin te bya ba byed mi nus so zhe na/_khyod kyi tshig stong bas kyang dngos po thams cad kyi rang
[\[122a.5\]]bzhin 'gog par mi 'thad do/_/ji ltar gzhan yang de skad zer na ni kha cig ni stong /[# ]kha cig ni mi stong ngo zhes mi 'dra ba nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro/_/mi 'dra ba nyid yin na ni gang gis na kha cig ni stong kha cig ni mi stong par gyur pa'i gtan tshigs kyi khyad par yang smros shig_/_
[\[122a.6\]]gtan tshigs de yang ma brtan [#]pas de la dngos po thams cad ni stong pa'o zhes smras pa gang yin pa de mi rung ngo /_/'di ltar gzhan yang /_de sgra ma 'byin lta bu'o zhes/_khyod blo sems na de mi 'thad/_/'di la sgra ni yod pa yis/_/'byung bar 'gyur ba de bzlog yin/_/
[\[122a.7\]]dper na kha cig na re sgra ma 'byin cig ces bdag nyid sgra 'byin te/_sgra des sgra zlog [#]par byed do/_/de bzhin du dngos po thams cad ni stong pa zhes stong pa'i rang bzhin gyi tshig gis dngos po thams cad kyi rang bzhin zlog [#]par byed do snyam na[#]/_'dir smras pa/_der [#]yang 'thad pa ma
[\[122b\]]
[\[122b.1\]]yin te/_'di la sgra yod pas sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ba 'gog par byed pa yin gyi/_'dir ni [#]khyod kyi yod pa'i tshig gis dngos po thams cad kyi rang bzhin 'gog par mi byed de/_khyod kyi lugs kyi tshig kyang yod pa ma yin/_dngos po thams cad kyi rang bzhin yang yod
[\[122b.2\]]pa ma yin pas de'i phyir sgra ma 'byin zhes pa lta bu'o zhes bya ba 'di ni mi mthun par sgra [#]smras pa yin no/_/'gog pa'i 'gog pa'ang de lta zhes/_/'dod na de yang bzang min te/_/de lta bas na'ang [#]khyod dam bcas/_/mtshan nyid skyon yod nged la med/_/khyod kyi blo la rnam
[\[122b.3\]]pa 'di nyid kyis 'gog pa'i 'gog pa yang mi 'thad de/_de la khyod kyis dngos po thams cad kyi rang bzhin 'gog pa'i tshig 'gog par byed pa'i tshig gang yin pa de yang mi 'thad do snyam du sems na/_'dir smra bar bya ste/_de yang bzang po ma yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_khyed
[\[122b.4\]]la ni dam bcas pa'i mtshan nyid kyis 'di[#] 'thob kyi/_nged la ni med pas [#]de lta yin na ni 'gog pa'i 'gog pa yang 'thad pa ma yin no zhes smras pa gang yin pa de mi rung ngo /_/'di ltar gzhan yang /_re zhig dngos rnams mngon sum gyis/_/dmigs nas zlog [#]par byed
[\[122b.5\]]min na/_/gang gis dngos rnams dmigs 'gyur ba/_/mngon sum de ni med pa yin/_/gal te khyod kyis dngos po thams cad mngon sum gyi [#]dmigs nas dngos po thams cad ni stong pa'o zhes [#]zlog par byed na ni mi rung ngo [#]/_/de yang 'thad pa ma yin te/_ci'i phyir
[\[122b.6\]]zhe na/dngos po thams cad kyi nang du ni mngon sum gyi tshad ma yang 'dus pa'i phyir stong pa yin la/_dngos po la dmigs par byed pa gang yin pa de yang stong pa yin no[#]/_/de'i phyir mngon sum gyi [#]tshad mas dmigs pa med do/_/mi dmigs pa 'gog pa yang mi 'thad pas de
[\[122b.7\]]la dngos po thams cad ni stong pa'o zhes smras pa gang yin pa de 'thad pa ma yin no/_/'on te khyod kyi blo la rjes su dpag pa dang lung dang dpes sems [#]'jal bas dmigs nas dngos po 'di thams cad zlog [#]par byed do snyam [#]du sems na 'dir smra bar bya ste/_rjes dpag lung dang
[\[123a\]]
[\[123a.1\]]dpes 'jal dang /_/rjes dpag lung gis bsgrub [#]bya dang /_/dpes bsgrub [#]bya ba'i don gang yin/_/mngon sum gyis ni lan btab po/_/rjes su dpag pa dang /_dpes 'jal ba dang /_lung yang mngon sum gyi tshad mas lan btab pa yin te/_'di
[\[123a.2\]]ltar mngon sum gyi tshad ma ni stong pa yin te/_dngos po thams cad stong pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de bzhin du rjes su dpag pa dang /_dpes 'jal ba dang /_lung yang stong pa yin te/_dngos po thams cad stong pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro/_/rjes su dpag pas bsgrub
[\[123a.3\]]par bya ba'i don dang /_lung gis bsgrub par bya ba dang /_dpes bsgrub par bya ba gang yin pa de dag kyang stong pa ma [#]yin te/_dngos po thams cad stong pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro/_/rjes su dpag pa dang /_lung dang /_dpes 'jal ba dag gis dngos po rnams la
[\[123a.4\]]dmigs par byed pa gang yin pa de yang stong pa nyid yin te/_de'i phyir dngos po rnams dmigs pa med do/_/mi dmigs pa'i rang bzhin 'gog pa mi 'thad pas de la dngos po thams cad ni stong pa'o zhes smras pa gang yin pa de mi rung ngo /_/'di ltar gzhan yang /_skye
[\[123a.5\]]bo chos kyi gnas skabs mkhas/_/dge ba dag gi chos rnams la/_/dge ba'i rang bzhin yin par ni/_/sems shing lhag ma rnams la [#]yang /_/'di la skye bo chos kyi gnas skabs la mkhas pa rnams ni dge ba'i chos rnams la brgya rtsa bcu dgur [#]sems te/_'di
[\[123a.6\]]lta ste/_rnam par shes pa dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_sems pa [#]dang /_reg pa dang /_yid la byed pa dang /_'dun pa dang /_mos pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_dran pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab dang /_btang snyoms dang /_sbyor ba dang /_yang
[\[123a.7\]]dag par sbyor ba dang /_thob pa dang /_lhag pa'i bsam pa dang /_khong khro ba med pa dang /_dga' ba dang /_'bad pa dang /_rtsol ba dang /_rmongs pa med pa [#]dang /_spro ba [#]dang /_gnod [#]pa med pa dang /_dbang dang ldan pa dang /_khong khro dang /_yid la gcags pa med pa dang /_
[\[123b\]]
[\[123b.1\]]'dzin pa dang /_mi 'dzin pa dang /_dran pa dang /_brtan pa dang /_lhag par zhen pa dang /_rmongs 'brel [#]dang /_spro ba med pa dang /_don du gnyer ba dang /_smon lam dang /_rgyags pa dang /_yul dang mi ldan pa dang /_nges par 'byin pa ma yin pa dang /_skye ba dang /_gnas pa dang /_
[\[123b.2\]]mi rtag pa dang /_rga [#]ba dang /_ldan pa dang /_yongs su gdungs pa [#]dang /_mi dga' ba dang /_rtog pa dang /_sdug pa dang /_dang ba dang /_'dod pa dang [#]/_mi mthun pa dang /_mthun par 'dzin pa dang /_rjes su mi mthun par bzung [#]ba dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_zhes dang /_ri mor byed pa dang /_
[\[123b.3\]]dad pa dang /_ma dad pa dang /_bsgo ba bzhin byed pa dang /_gus pa dang /_ma gus pa dang /_rgod pa [#]dang /_shin tu sbyangs pa dang /_ngag dang /_'gul [#]ba dang /_grub pa dang /_ma dang ba dang /_shin tu ma sbyangs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba dang /_brtan pa dang /_des pa dang /_yid la
[\[123b.4\]]gcags pa dang /_mya ngan dang /_'khrugs [#]pa dang /_rgyags pa dang /_mi mthun par 'dzin pa dang /_the tshom dang /_sdom pa dang [#]/_yongs su dag pa dang /_nang legs par dang ba dang /_'jigs pa'i phyogs gcig dang /_dad pa dang /_ngo tsha shes pa dang /_gnam pa dang /_mi 'drid
[\[123b.5\]]pa dang /_nye bar zhi ba dang /_rtab [#]bag ma yin pa dang /_bag yod pa dang /_byams par lta ba dang /_so sor brtag [#]pa dang /_yid byung ba dang /_yongs su gdungs pa [#]med pa dang /_rgyags pa med pa dang /_chags pa med pa dang /_zhe sdang med pa dang /_gti mug med pa dang /_thams cad
[\[123b.6\]]shes pa nyid dang /_mi gtong ba dang /_'byor ba dang /_khrel yod pa dang /_mi 'chab pa dang /_snying rje dang /_sems pa mi gtong ba dang /_byams pa dang /_zhum pa med pa dang /_dga' [#]bral ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul dang /_khon du mi 'dzin pa dang /_phrag dog med pa dang /_sems yongs su
[\[123b.7\]]gdug [#]pa med pa dang /_bzod pa dang /_rnam par spangs ba [#]dang /_des pa ma yin pa dang /_yongs su longs spyod pa'i rjes su mthun pa dang /_bsod nams dang /_'du shes pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_nges par 'byin pa nyid dang /_thams cad mi shes pa nyid dang /_'dus
[\[124a\]]
[\[124a.1\]]ma byas pa'i chos so zhes de ltar dge ba'i chos rnams la dge ba'i rang bzhin brgya rtsa bcu dgu dang /_de bzhin du mi dge ba'i chos rnams la mi dge ba'i rang bzhin dang /_bsgribs [#]la lung du ma bstan pa rnams la bsgribs [#]la lung du ma bstan pa'i rang bzhin dang /_
[\[124a.2\]]ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa rnams la ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa'i rang bzhin dang /_'dod par gsungs pa rnams la 'dod par gsungs pa dang /_gzugs su gsungs pa rnams la gzugs su gsungs pa dang /_gzugs med par gsungs pa rnams la
[\[124a.3\]]gzugs med par gsungs pa dang /_zag pa med pa rnams la zag pa med pa dang /_sdug bsngal dang /_kun 'byung ba dang /_'gog pa dang /_lam zhes bya ba rnams la sdug bsngal dang /_kun 'byung ba dang /_'gog pa dang /_lam zhes bya ba'i rang bzhin dang /_bsgoms [# ]
[\[124a.4\]]pas spang bar bya ba rnams la bsgoms [#]pas spang bar bya ba dang /_spang bar bya ba ma yin pa rnams la spang bar bya ba ma yin pa'i rang bzhin du sems te/_de'i phyir de ltar na rnam pa du ma'i chos kyi rang bzhin mthong bas de bas na dngos po thams cad ni rang bzhin med pa ste/_rang bzhin
[\[124a.5\]]med pa nyid yin pa'i phyir stong pa'o zhes smras pa gang yin pa de mi rung ngo /_/'di ltar gzhan yang /_nges 'byin la sogs rnams kyi chos/_/gnas skabs gsungs pa de rnams la/_/nges 'byin rang bzhin chos rnams dang /_/nges 'byin min gang tshul de bzhin/_/'di la
[\[124a.6\]]nges par 'byin pa'i chos kyi gnas skabs gsungs pa rnams la nges par 'byin pa'i rang bzhin dang /_nges par 'byin pa ma yin pa rnams la nges par 'byin pa ma yin pa'i rang bzhin dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang ldan pa rnams la byang chub kyi yan lag dang ldan pa dang /_byang
[\[124a.7\]]chub kyi yan lag dang mi ldan pa rnams la byang chub kyi yan lag dang mi ldan pa dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs dang ldan pa rnams la byang chub kyi phyogs dang ldan pa dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs dang mi ldan pa rnams la byang chub kyi phyogs dang mi ldan pa dang lhag ma rnams la yang de
[\[124b\]]
[\[124b.1\]]bzhin te/_de'i phyir de ltar rnam pa du ma'i chos rnams kyi rang bzhin mthong ba de'i phyir dngos po thams cad ni rang bzhin med pa ste/_de bas na stong pa'o zhes smras pa gang yin pa de mi rung ngo /_/'di ltar gzhan yang /_gal te chos kyi rang bzhin med/_/rang bzhin med ces
[\[124b.2\]]bya ba'i ming /_/ming yang de bzhin med 'gyur nyid/_/gzhi med ming ni med phyir ro/_/gal te chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin med pa yin na de la yang [#]rang bzhin med do zhes bya ba'i ming yang de bzhin du med par 'gyur ro/_/ci'i phyir zhe na/_gzhi med pa'i ming ni 'ga' yang med
[\[124b.3\]]pa'i phyir ro/_/de bas na mi srid pa'i phyir dngos po rnams kyi rang bzhin yod do/_/rang bzhin yod pa'i phyir dngos po thams cad stong pa ma yin no/_/de bas na [#]chos thams cad rang bzhin med pa ste/_rang bzhin med pa nyid yin pa'i phyir stong pa'o zhes smras pa gang yin pa de
[\[124b.4\]]rigs pa ma yin no/_/'on te 'di ltar rang bzhin yod/_/de ni chos la med ce na/_/chos rnams med pa'i rang bzhin te/_/gang gi yin pa de bstan rigs/_/'on te gzhi med pa'i ming du gyur na mi rung ngo snyam nas rang bzhin ni yod la/_de yang chos thams cad la ni mi srid do/_/
[\[124b.5\]]de ltar na chos rnams [#]rang bzhin med pa'i phyir chos ni stong par [#]'gyur la/_ming gzhi med par yang ma yin no snyam du sems na/_'dir smra bar bya ste/_de lta yin na rang bzhin de chos la [#]gtogs pa'i don gang yin pa'i don de bstan par rigs so/_/de yang ma bstan pas de'i phyir
[\[124b.6\]]rang bzhin ni yod la/_de yang chos rnams ni med do zhes rtog pa gang yin pa de nyams so/_/'di ltar gzhan yang /_gang phyir khyim na bum pa de/_/med ces yod pa nyid la 'gog_/mthong ste de phyir khyod kyis 'di/_/yod pa'i rang bzhin 'gog pa yin/_/'di la
[\[124b.7\]]don yod pa la 'gog par byed kyi/_med pa la ni ma yin te/_dper na khyim na bum pa med ces bya ba lta bu ste/_bum pa yod pa la 'gog pa yin gyi/_med pa la ni ma yin no/_/de bzhin du chos rnams kyi rang bzhin med do zhes bya ba yang rang bzhin yod pa la 'gog par
[\[125a\]]
[\[125a.1\]]'gyur ba yin gyi/_med pa la ni ma yin pas de la chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin med do zhes smras pa gang yin pa de mi rung ngo /_/'di ltar gzhan yang 'gog pa yod pa nyid kyi phyir dngos po thams cad kyi rang bzhin rab tu grub pa yin no/_/ji ltar rang [# ]
[\[125a.2\]]bzhin de med na/_/khyod kyi tshig des ci zhig dgag_/med pa yin na tshig med par/_/'gog par rab tu grub pa yin/_/ji ste rang bzhin de med pa nyid yin na ni[#]/_dngos po thams cad rang bzhin [#]med do zhes bya ba'i tshig 'dis khyod kyis [#]ci zhig 'gog par byed/_'di ltar
[\[125a.3\]]med pa la ni tshig med par yang 'gog par 'grub ste/_ji ltar me la grang ba nyid dang /_chu la tsha ba nyid lta bu'o/_/'di ltar gzhan yang /_byis pa rnams ni smig rgyu la/_/ji ltar log par chur 'dzin ltar/_/de bzhin khyod kyis log par 'dzin/_/yod par [#]min la
[\[125a.4\]]dgag [#]par bya/_/khyod kyi blo la ji ltar byis pa rnams smig rgyu la log par chur 'dzin pa na/_de [#]skyes bu mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can gyis 'dzin pa de bzlog pa'i phyir de na chu med kyi/_de ni smig rgyu'o zhes zer ba de bzhin du rang bzhin [#]med pa rnams la sems can rnams kyi [#]rang
[\[125a.5\]]bzhin du 'dzin pa gang yin pa de bzlog pa'i phyir dngos po thams cad ni rang bzhin med pa'o zhes bya ba'o snyam du sems na/_'dir smra bar bya ste/_de lta na ni 'dzin pa dang /_/gzung ba [#]'dzin pa po de dang /_/'gog pa [#]dgag bya 'gog pa po/_/de drug yod pa ma yin nam/_/
[\[125a.6\]]gal te de lta na ni re zhig sems can rnams kyi 'dzin pa yang yod pa dang /_gzung ba yod pa dang /_de 'dzin pa po yod pa dang /_log par 'dzin pa de 'gog pa yang yod pa dang /_dgag par bya ba log par 'dzin pa de yang yod pa dang /_khyed [#]la sogs pa 'dzin pa de
[\[125a.7\]]'gog pa po yang yod de/_drug tu grub pa ma yin nam/_de drug tu gyur na ni/_ma bkag pa nyid yin pa'i phyir dang [#]dngos po thams cad ni stong pa'o zhes smras pa gang yin pa de mi rung ngo /_/ji [#]ste 'dzin pa yod min zhing /_/gzung med 'dzin pa po med na/_/'o na 'gog
[\[125b\]]
[\[125b.1\]]dang dgag bya dang /_/'gog pa po yang yod min te/_/ci ste skyon der gyur na mi rung ngo snyam nas 'dzin pa yang med/_gzung ba yang med 'dzin pa po yang med do zhe na/_de lta na ni dngos po thams cad ni rang bzhin med do zhes bya ba 'dzin pa 'gog pa gang yin pa de yang med
[\[125b.2\]]la/_dgag par bya ba yang med/_'gog pa po yang med par 'gyur te/_gal te 'gog dang dgag bya dang /_/'gog pa po yang yod min na/_/dngos po kun dang de rnams kyi/_/rang bzhin nyid kyang grub yin na/_/gal te 'gog pa yang med/_dgag par bya ba
[\[125b.3\]]yang med/_'gog pa po yang med na ni/_dngos po thams cad kyang ma bkag par yod la/_dngos po rnams kyi rang bzhin yang yod do/_/'di ltar gzhan yang /_khyod la gtan tshigs ma grub ste/_/rang bzhin med phyir khyod gtan tshigs/_/gang la yod de khyod
[\[125b.4\]]don te[#]/_/gtan tshigs med phyir grub mi 'thad/_/dngos po thams cad ni rang bzhin med do zhes bya ba'i don 'di la khyod kyi [#]gtan tshigs ma grub ste/_de [#]ci'i phyir zhe na/_dngos po thams cad ni rang bzhin med pa'i phyir stong pa nyid yin pas de'i phyir gtan tshigs ga la yod/_
[\[125b.5\]]gtan tshigs med na ni gtan tshigs med par dngos po thams cad stong pa'o zhes bya ba'i don gang [#]la grub pas de la dngos po thams cad stong pa'o zhes smras pa gang yin pa de mi rung ngo /_/'di ltar gzhan yang /_khyod la gtan tshigs med par yang /_/rang bzhin bzlog pa grub
[\[125b.6\]]yin na/_/nga la'ang gtan tshigs med par ni/_/rang bzhin nyid ni yod par 'grub/_/ci ste de la gtan tshigs med par yang dngos po rnams kyi rang bzhin med par 'grub po snyam du sems na/_ji ltar khyod la gtan tshigs med par [#]rang bzhin bzlog pa grub pa de bzhin du/_
[\[125b.7\]]nga la yang gtan tshigs med par dngos po'i rang bzhin yod par 'grub bo/_/nga la yang zhes bya ba ni nged la yang ngo /_/gal te gtan tshigs yod na dngos/_/rang bzhin med ces bya mi 'thad/_/'jig rten na ni rang bzhin med/_/dngos po 'ga' yang yod min no/_/gal
[\[126a\]]
[\[126a.1\]]te dngos po rnams kyi rang bzhin med pa nyid kyi gtan tshigs yod pa kho na'o snyam du sems na/_de lta na ni [#]dngos po thams cad rang bzhin med do zhes bya ba mi 'thad do/_/ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jig rten na rang bzhin med pa'i dngos po 'ga' yang yod pa ma
[\[126a.2\]]yin no/_/'di ltar rang bzhin yod min na/_/gal te 'gog snga dgag phyi [#]zhes/_/zer na 'thad pa ma yin la/_/'phyi [#]zhing cig car 'ang [#]mi 'thad do/_/rang bzhin med pa zhes bya ba 'dir gal te 'gog pa ni snga la dgag par bya ba ni 'phyi'o zhe na/_'thad pa ma yin te/_dgag
[\[126a.3\]]par bya ba yod pa ma yin na gang gi 'gog pa yin par 'gyur ro[#]/_/'on te 'gog pa ni 'phyi la dgag par bya ba ni [#]snga'o zhe na/_de [#]'thad pa ma yin te/_dgag par bya ba grub zin na/_ci zhig 'gog par byed/_'on te 'gog pa dang dgag par bya ba 'gog [#]mnyam mo zhe na/_de lta
[\[126a.4\]]na yang 'gog pa ni dgag par bya ba'i don gyi rgyu ma yin la/_dgag par bya ba yang 'gog pa'i ma yin te/_dper na ri bong gi rwa g.yas g.yon gnyis mgo mnyam du skyes pa lta bu ste/_rwa g.yas pa yang g.yon pa'i rgyu ma yin pa/_g.yon pa yang g.yas pa'i rgyu ma yin
[\[126a.5\]]pa lta bu yin pas de la dngos po thams cad rang bzhin med do zhes [#]pa gang yin pa de mi rung ngo /_/'dir bshad pa re zhig khyod kyis/_gal te dngos po thams cad kyi/_/rang bzhin kun la'ang yod min na/_/khyod kyi tshigs [#]kyang rang bzhin med/_/rang bzhin bzlog par mi nus so/_/
[\[126a.6\]]zhes smras pa gang yin pa de la bshad par bya ste/_gal te nga'i tshig rgyu rkyen dang /_/tshogs [#]dang tha dad pa yang med/_/'o na dngos rnams stong grub [#]ste/_/rang bzhin med pa nyid phyir ro/_/gal te nga'i tshig rgyu 'byung ba chen po rnams dang mtshungs par ldan pa rnams dang /_ldan pa ma
[\[126a.7\]]yin pa rnams la yang med/_rkyen brang dang /_lkog ma dang /_mchu dang /_lce dang /_so'i brun dang /_rkan dang /_sna dang /_spyi bo la sogs pa dang /_'bad pa rnams la yang med/_gnyi ga tshogs pa la yang med/_rgyu dang rkyen tshogs pa la yang med[#]/_rgyu dang rkyen tshogs pa las [#]ma
[\[126b\]]
[\[126b.1\]]gtogs pa [#]tha dad pa yang med do/_/de'i phyir rang bzhin med pa yin te/_rang bzhin med pa'i phyir stong pa yin no zhe na/_'o na ni nga'i tshig de [#]stong par grub ste/_rang bzhin med pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro/_/ji ltar nga'i tshig de rang bzhin med pa nyid yin pa'i phyir stong pa yin
[\[126b.2\]]pa de bzhin du dngos po thams cad kyang rang bzhin med pa nyid yin pa'i phyir stong pa yin pas na de la khyod kyis [#]tshig stong pa yin pa'i phyir dngos po thams cad stong pa nyid du mi 'thad do zhes smras pa gang yin pa de mi rung ngo /_/'di ltar gzhan yang /_dngos rnams rten nas
[\[126b.3\]]byung [#]ba gang /_/de ni stong nyid ces bya dang /_/gang zhig rten [#]nas 'byung ba de/_/rang bzhin nyid med yin par smra/_/khyod kyis ni dngos po rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyi don khong du [#]chud par khyod kyi tshig rang bzhin med pa yin pa'i phyir/_dngos po rnams kyi rang bzhin 'gog pa
[\[126b.4\]]mi 'thad de zhes klan ka tshol ba smra bar byed de/_'dir ni dngos po rnams rten [#]nas 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni stong pa nyid yin no/_/ci'i phyir zhe na/_rang bzhin med pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro/_/dngos po gang dag rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba de dag ni rang bzhin dang bcas pa ma yin
[\[126b.5\]]te/_rang bzhin med pa'i phyir ro/_/ci'i phyir zhe na/_rgyu dang rkyen la ltos pa dang bcas pa'i phyir ro/_/gal te dngos po rnams rang bzhin gyis yod pa [#]ni rgyu dang rkyen med kyang yod par 'gyur ba zhig na/_de ltar yang ma yin pas de'i phyir rang bzhin med pa yin te/_des na stong pa'o/_/
[\[126b.6\]]zhes bya bar 'thad do/_/de bzhin du nga'i tshig kyang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yin te[#]/_de'i phyir rang bzhin med do/_/rang bzhin med pa nyid yin pa'i phyir stong pa'o [#]zhes bya bar 'thad pa yin no/_/ji ltar bum pa dang snam bu la sogs pa rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba nyid yin pa'i
[\[126b.7\]]phyir rang bzhin stong pa yin pa [#]sbrang rtsi dang /_chu dang /_'o thug 'dzin pa dang /_len pa dang /_grang ba dang /_rlung dang /_nyi mas [#]yongs su skyob par nus pa [#]de bzhin du nga'i tshig kyang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yin pa'i phyir rang bzhin med pa yin yang dngos po rnams rang bzhin med par rab
[\[127a\]]
[\[127a.1\]]tu sgrub [#]par nus pa yin pas de la khyod kyi tshig rang bzhin med pa nyid yin pa'i phyir dngos po thams cad kyi rang bzhin 'gog pa 'thad pa ma [#]yin no zhes smras pa gang yin pa de mi rung ngo /_/'di ltar gzhan yang /_sprul pa yis ni sprul pa dang /_/sgyu ma yis [# ]
[\[127a.2\]]ni skyes bu yi[#]/_/sgyu mas phyung la 'gog byed ltar/_/'gog pa de yang de bzhin 'gyur/_/ji ltar sprul pa'i skyes bus sprul pa'i skyes bu zhig don 'ga' zhig gi phyir 'ong bar byed pa la 'gog par [#]byed pa dang /_sgyu ma mkhan gyis phyung ba'i sgyu ma'i skyes bus sgyu ma'i skyes bu
[\[127a.3\]]gzhan zhig don 'ga' zhig gi phyir 'ong bar byed pa la 'gog par byed pa bzhin te de la sprul pa'i skyes bu dgag par bya ba gang yin pa de yang stong pa yin/_'gog par byed pa de yang stong pa yin sgyu ma'i skyes bu dgag par bya ba gang yin pa de yang stong pa yin 'gog par byed pa
[\[127a.4\]]gang yin pa de yang stong pa yin pa de bzhin du nga'i tshig stong pas kyang dngos po thams cad stong pa nyid du [#]dngos po thams cad kyi rang bzhin 'gog pa 'thad pa na de la khyod kyi tshig stong pa nyid yin pa'i phyir dngos po thams cad kyi rang bzhin 'gog pa 'thad pa ma yin no zhes smras pa gang
[\[127a.5\]]yin pa de rung ba ma yin no/_/de la khyod kyis mu drug tu smras pa gang yin pa de yang de nyid kyis bkag pa yin te/_de lta yin na thams cad kyi nang du nga'i tshig kyang ma 'dus pa yin zhing mi stong pa'ang ma yin la/_dngos po thams cad kyang mi stong pa ma yin no/_/yang khyod
[\[127a.6\]]kyis/_'on te tshig de rang bzhin bcas/_/khyod kyi dam bcas snga ma nyams/_/mi 'dra nyid de de yin na/_/gtan tshigs khyad par brjod par byos/_/zhes smras pa gang yin pa 'di la bshad par bya ste/_nga'i tshig de rang bzhin med/_/de phyir smras pa ma nyams la/_/mi 'dra
[\[127a.7\]]nyid kyang med pas na/_/gtan tshigs khyad par bshad mi bya/_/re zhig nga'i tshig de ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yin pa'i phyir rang bzhin 'thad pa ma yin te/_ji skad du/_sngar rang bzhin 'thad pa ma yin pa'i phyir stong pa yin no zhes bshad pa lta bu'o/_/gang gi phyir nga'i tshig de
[\[127b\]]
[\[127b.1\]]yang stong pa yin/_dngos po lhag ma rnams kyang stong pa yin pa de'i phyir mi 'dra ba nyid med do/_/gal te nga na re tshig de ni stong pa ma yin la dngos po lhag ma thams cad ni stong pa yin no zhes 'chad pa ni des na mi 'dra ba nyid du yang 'gyur na/_de na de [#]lta ma yin pas de'i phyir mi
[\[127b.2\]]'dra ba nyid med do/_/gang gi phyir tshig de ni stong pa ma yin la dngos po lhag ma thams cad ni stong pa yin no zhes mi 'dra ba nyid mi srid pa de'i phyir kho bos gtan tshigs [#]des na tshig de ni stong pa ma yin la/_dngos po thams cad ni stong pa yin no zhes gtan tshigs kyi khyad par
[\[127b.3\]]bshad par mi bya ste/_de la khyed kyis smras pa yang nyams la/_mi 'dra ba nyid kyang yin pas khyod kyis gtan tshigs [#]khyad par yang brjod par byos shig ces smras pa gang yin pa de mi rung ngo /_/yang /_de sgra ma 'byin lta bu'o zhes/_/khyod blo sems ni [#]de mi 'thad/_/'di la sgra
[\[127b.4\]]ni yod pa yis[#]/_/'byung bar 'gyur ba de bzlog yin/_/zhes smras pa gang yin pa 'di la bshad par bya ste/_sgra ma 'byin zhes bya bzhin zhes/_/khyod kyis [#]gang brtsams dpe 'di min/_/de ni sgra yis sgra bzlog pas/_/'di ni de lta ma yin no/_/'di ni nged kyi dpe ma yin te/_
[\[127b.5\]]ji ltar 'ga' zhig na re/_sgra ma 'byin zhes de skad zer ba na sgra nyid 'byin cing sgra zlog par [#]byed pa ltar tshig stong pa de [#]nyid 'gog par mi byed do/_/ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di la dpes sgra zlog [#]par byed pa de ltar 'di ni ma yin te/_nged ni dngos po thams cad rang bzhin med pa yin te/_rang bzhin
[\[127b.6\]]med pa'i phyir stong pa yin no zhes 'chad do/_/ci'i phyir zhe na/_gal te rang bzhin med nyid kyis/_/ji ste rang bzhin med la bzlog_/rang bzhin med pa nyid log na/_/rang bzhin nyid du rab grub 'gyur/_/ji ltar sgra ma 'byin ces bya ba lta bu sgras zlog [#]par byed pa de bzhin du/_
[\[127b.7\]]gal te tshig rang bzhin med pa nyid kyi [#]dngos po rang bzhin med pa rnams la zlog [#]par byed na ni des na dpe 'di [#]'thad par 'gyur ba zhig na/_'dir ni tshig rang bzhin med pa nyid kyi [#]dngos po rnams kyi rang bzhin 'gog par byed do/_/gal te tshig rang bzhin med pa nyid kyis dngos po rnams kyi
[\[128a\]]
[\[128a.1\]]rang bzhin med pa nyid 'gog par byed na ni rang bzhin med pa nyid bkag pa'i phyir [#]dngos po rnams rang bzhin dang bcas par 'gyur la/_rang bzhin dang bcas pa'i phyir stong pa ma yin par 'gyur ro/_/kho bo cag ni dngos po rnams stong pa nyid smra yi[#]/_stong pa nyid
[\[128a.2\]]ma yin par ni smra ba ma yin pas dpe ma yin no[#]/_/yang na kha cig sprul pa yis/_/bud med la ni bud med snyam/_/log 'dzin 'byung la sprul pa yis/_/'gog byed 'di ni de lta yin/_/yang na ji ltar skyes bu kha cig sprul pa'i bud med rang bzhin gyis stong pa yin pa la don dam par
[\[128a.3\]]bud med do snyam du log par 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/de'i phyir de log par 'dzin pa des de'i [#]'dod chags bskyed pa la de bzhin gshegs pa'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyis sprul pa zhig sprul la/_des de'i log par 'dzin pa de zlog [#]par byed do/_/de bzhin du nga'i
[\[128a.4\]]tshig stong pa sprul pa lta bus dngos po thams cad kyi rang bzhin med pa sprul pa'i bud med dang 'dra ba dag la rang bzhin yod par 'dzin pa gang yin pa zlog [#]par byed do/_/de bas na 'dir stong pa nyid du rab tu bsgrub pa la dpe 'di 'thad pa yin gyi/_cig shos ni ma yin no/_/yang
[\[128a.5\]]na gang phyir bsgrub bya dang /_/gtan tshigs 'di mtshungs sgra yod min/_/tha snyad khas rnams [#]ma blangs par/_/nged cag 'chad [#]par mi byed do/_/bsgrub par bya ba dang /_sgra ma 'byin zhes bya ba lta bu'o zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs 'di mtshungs pa kho na yin no/_/ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[128a.6\]]dngos po thams cad ni rang bzhin med pa nyid du khyad par med pa nyid kyi phyir sgra de ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba nyid yin pa'i phyir [#]rang bzhin yod pa ma yin no/_/de lta bas na rang bzhin yod pa ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir/_'di la sgra ni yod pa yis/_/'byung bar gyur pa [#]de bzlog yin/_/
[\[128a.7\]]zhes smras pa gang yin pa bzlog pa yin no/_/gzhan yang tha snyad kyi bden pa khas ma blangs shing ma brten par dngos po thams cad stong pa'o zhes mi 'chad do/_/tha snyad kyi bden pa khas ma blangs par ni chos bstan par mi nus te/_ji skad du/_tha snyad la ni ma brten par/_/
[\[128b\]]
[\[128b.1\]]dam pa'i don la [#]mi ston la/_/dam pa'i don la ma brten par/_/mya ngan 'das pa mi rtogs so/_/zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o/_/de lta [#]bas na dngos po thams cad kyi rang bzhin med pa nyid du gnyi ga 'thad pa na nga'i tshig bzhin du dngos po thams cad stong pa yin no/_/yang khyod
[\[128b.2\]]kyis/_'gog pa'i 'gog pa'ang de lta zhes/_/'dod na de yang bzang min te/_/de lta na yang khyod dam bcas/_/mtshan nyid skyon yod nged la med/_/ces smras pa gang yin pa 'di la bshad par bya ste/_gal te ngas dam bcas 'ga' yod/_/des na nga la skyon de yod/_/
[\[128b.3\]]nga la dam bcas med pas [#]na/_/nga la skyon med kho na yin/_/gal te dam bcas pa 'ga' zhig yod na ni/_des na khyod kyis ji skad smras pa bzhin du/_nga la dam bcas pa'i mtshan nyid khas blangs pa sngon du song ba'i skyon yod pa zhig na nga la [#]dam bcas pa
[\[128b.4\]]'ga' yang med do/_/de'i phyir dngos po thams cad stong pa gtan du nye bar zhi ba rang bzhin gyis dben pa dag la dam bcas pa [#]ga la yod/_dam bcas pa'i mtshan nyid kyang ga la yod/_dam bcas pa'i mtshan nyid las byung ba'i skyon yang ga la yod de/_de la khyod la dam
[\[128b.5\]]bcas pa'i mtshan nyid kyis thob pa'i phyir khyod [#]la skyon yod do zhes smras pa gang yin pa de yang med do/_/yang khyod kyis/_re zhig dngos rnams mngon sum gyis/_/dmigs nas zlog [#]par byed yin na/_/gang gis dngos rnams dmigs 'gyur ba/_/mngon sum de ni med pa
[\[128b.6\]]yin/_/rjes dpag lung dang dpes gzhal dang /_/rjes dpag lung gis [#]bsgrub bya dang /_/dpes bsgrub bya ba'i don gang yin/_/mngon sum gyis ni lan btab po/_/zhes smras pa gang yin pa 'di la bshad par bya ste/_/gal te mngon sum la sogs pa'i/_/don gyis
[\[128b.7\]]'ga' zhig dmigs na ni/_/bsgrub pa'am bzlog par bya na de/_/med phyir nga la klan ka med/_/gal te ngas mngon sum dang /_rjes su dpag pa dang /_dpes 'jal ba dang /_lung rnams kyis sam/_tshad ma bzhi rnams las gang yang rung ba zhig gis 'ga' zhig [#]dmigs na ni
[\[129a\]]
[\[129a.1\]]de'i phyir sgrub par byed pa'am/_don bzlog par bya na ngas don ji ltar yang ma dmigs pas de'i phyir bsgrub par yang mi bya/_bzlog par yang mi bya/_de ltar gyur dang de la khyod kyis gal te mngon sum la sogs pa rnams la [#]tshad ma gang yang rung ba zhig
[\[129a.2\]]gis dngos po rnams dmigs nas zlog [#]par byed pa yin na/_tshad ma de dag kyang med/_de dag gis khong du chud par bya ba'i don yang med pas zhes klan ka smra ba [#]gang yin pa'i klan ka de nga la mi 'byung ngo /_/'di ltar gzhan yang /_gal te khyod kyis [#]don de rnams/_/tshad ma
[\[129a.3\]]nyid kyis rab grub na/_/khyod kyis [#]tshad ma de rnams kyang /_/ji ltar rab tu 'grub par 'gyur/_/gal te 'jal bar byed pa rnams kyis gzhal bar bya ba dag bzhin du khyod kyi don gzhal bar [#]bya ba de rnams tshad ma nyid kyis rab tu 'grub pa yin par sems na/_'o na da tshad ma
[\[129a.4\]]rnams pa bzhi po mngon sum dang /_rjes su dpag pa dang /_dpes gzhal [#]ba dang /_lung de rnams gang gis rab tu 'grub/_gal te re zhig tshad ma de rnams ni tshad ma gzhan rnams kyis yod par 'grub la/_don rnams ni tshad mas rab tu 'grub pa yin no zhe na/_dam
[\[129a.5\]]bcas pa nyams par 'gyur ro/_/'on te yang /_gal te tshad ma gzhan rnams kyis/_/tshad ma 'grub na thug pa med/_/gal te 'di snyam du gzhal bar bya ba ni tshad ma rnams kyis 'grub la/_tshad ma de rnams kyang tshad ma gzhan rnams kyis 'grub par sems na/_de
[\[129a.6\]]lta na yang [#]thug pa med par 'gyur ro/_/de la thug pa med par gyur na nyes pa ci yod ce na/_de la 'di ltar bshad par bya ste/_de la dang po 'grub min la[#]/_/bar ma min zhing tha ma'ang min/_/thug pa [#]med par gyur pa [#]na/_/dang po 'grub par mi 'gyur ro/_/ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[129a.7\]]tshad ma de rnams kyang tshad ma gzhan rnams kyis rab tu 'grub pa yin la/[# ]de rnams kyang gzhan rnams kyi yin pas 'di la dang po med do/_/dang po med pa'i phyir bar ma yang ga la yod/_tha ma yang ga la yod de de'i phyir tshad ma de rnams ni tshad ma gzhan rnams kyis rab tu
[\[129b\]]
[\[129b.1\]]'grub pa'o [#]zhes smras pa gang yin pa de mi 'thad do/_/'on te tshad ma med par yang /_/de rnams 'grub na smra ba nyams/_/mi 'dra nyid de de yin na/_/gtan tshigs khyad par smra bar gyis/_/'on te tshad ma rnams med par yang tshad ma de rnams [#]rab tu 'grub pa yin la/_
[\[129b.2\]]gzhal bar bya ba'i don rnams ni tshad ma rnams kyis rab tu 'grub pa yin no snyam du sems na de lta na ni khyod kyi [#]tshad ma rnams kyis don rnams 'grub po zhes smras pa gang yin pa de [#]nyams par 'gyur la don kha cig ni tshad ma rnams kyis rab tu 'grub pa yin/_kha cig ni ma yin no zhes
[\[129b.3\]]mi 'dra ba nyid du yang 'gyur ro/_/de lta na ni gtan tshigs gang gis na don kha cig ni tshad ma rnams kyis rab tu 'grub pa yin la/_kha cig ni ma yin no zhes gtan tshigs kyi khyad par yang smra bar bya ba yin na/_de yang ma bstan pas de'i phyir rtog pa 'di [#]yang 'thad pa ma yin no/_/
[\[129b.4\]]'dir smras pa/_ji skad du/_ji ltar me yis gzhan bdag nyid/_/gsal byed de bzhin rang nyid ltar/_/de bzhin tshad ma rnams kyang ni/_/rang gzhan bdag nyid 'grub ce na/_/zhes bstan pa lta bur tshad ma rnams kyis [#]rang gi bdag nyid dang /_gzhan gyi bdag nyid rab tu sgrub par
[\[129b.5\]]byed pa yin te/_ji ltar mes rang gi bdag nyid dang /_gzhan gyi bdag nyid gsal bar byed pa de bzhin du tshad ma rnams kyang rang gi bdag nyid dang gzhan gyi bdag nyid rab tu sgrub par byed pa yin no zhe na/_'dir bshad pa/_smras pa de ni mi mthun te/_/mun khung [#]gi ni rdza ma ltar/_/
[\[129b.6\]]de la mi dmigs ma mthong bas/_/me ni rang la gsal byed min/_/me dang 'dra bar tshad ma rnams kyang [#]rang dang gzhan gyi bdag nyid gnyis rab tu sgrub par byed pa yin no zhes smras pa de ni mi mthun pa nyid yin te/_me ni rang las [#]gsal bar byed pa ma yin te/_ji ltar me mi [#]'bar
[\[129b.7\]]ba'i snga rol na mun khung na bum pa mi dmigs pa [#]la/_mes gsal bar byas nas phyis dmigs pa de bzhin du/_gal te gsal bar ma byas pa'i snga rol du me mun khung na yod la/_phyis mes gsal bar 'gyur na ni de'i phyir rang gi bdag nyid gsal bar byed pa yin na/_de yang de lta
[\[130a\]]
[\[130a.1\]]ma yin pas rtog pa 'di yang 'thad pa ma yin no/_/'di ltar gzhan yang /_gal te khyod kyi tshig gis ni/_/me 'dis [#]rang bdag gsal byed na/_/'o na me yis gzhan bzhin du/_/rang la sreg pa'ang byed par 'gyur/_/gal te khyod zer ba ji ltar
[\[130a.2\]]mes [#]gzhan gyi rang bzhin gsal bar byed pa de bzhin du rang gi bdag nyid la yang gsal bar byed do zhe na/_'o na ni ji ltar gzhan gyi bdag nyid sreg par byed pa de bzhin du rang gi bdag nyid la yang sreg par 'gyur ba zhig na/_de ni [#]de ltar yang ma yin pas de la me ni gzhan gyi bdag nyid [#]la
[\[130a.3\]]yang gsal bar byed do zhes smras pa gang yin pa de mi rung ngo /_/'di ltar gzhan yang /_gal te khyod kyi tshig gis ni/_/me yis rang gzhan bdag gsal byed/_/me bzhin du ni mun pa yang /_/rang gzhan bdag la bsgrib [#]par 'gyur/_/gal te khyod kyi lugs kyis ni me ni rang
[\[130a.4\]]dang gzhan gyi bdag nyid gnyis gsal bar byed pa yin na/_'o na ni da gnyen por gyur pa mun pa [#]yang rang dang gzhan gyi bdag nyid gnyis bsgrib [#]par 'gyur ba zhig na/_de ni [#]de ltar yang ma yin pas de la me ni rang dang gzhan gyis [#]bdag nyid gnyis gsal bar byed pa yin no zhes
[\[130a.5\]]smras pa gang yin pa de rung ba ma yin no/_/'di ltar gzhan yang /_gsal byed de ni mun sel te/_/me dang gang na mi gnas pa/_/gzhan na'ang mun pa yod min na/_/ji ltar gsal bar byed pa yin/_/'dir me la yang mun pa med la/_/gang na me [#]yod pa de na [#]yang
[\[130a.6\]]mun pa med do/_/gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba ni mun pa sel ba yin pas de'i phyir me la yang mun pa med la/_gang na me yod pa de na yang mun pa med na mes gang zhig sel bas rang dang gzhan gyi bdag nyid gnyis gsal bar byed pa'i mes mun pa gang zhig sel bar byed/_
[\[130a.7\]]'dir smras pa/_'o na gang gi phyir me la yang mun pa med/_me gang na yod pa de na yang mun pa med pa de [#]nyid kyi phyir me ni rang dang gzhan gyi bdag nyid gnyi ga [#]gsal bar byed pa ma yin nam/_me 'byung ba nyid na me des mun pa bsal [#]ba yin te/_de la yang mun pa de med/_
[\[130b\]]
[\[130b.1\]]me gang na yod pa de na yang mun pa med de de'i phyir me 'byung ba kho na rang gi bdag nyid dang /_gzhan gyi bdag nyid gnyi ga gsal bar byed pa yin no zhe na/_'dir smras pa/_me 'byung ba na gsal byed pa/_/yang dag min par smra ba ste/_/me 'byung ba na mun pa dang /_/
[\[130b.2\]]phrad pa med pa kho na yin/_/me de ni 'byung ba khon na rang gi bdag nyid dang gzhan gyi bdag nyid gsal bar byed do zhes smra ba de ni 'thad pa ma yin no/_/ci'i phyir zhe na/_me 'byung ba nyid [#]na mun pa dang phrad pa med pa kho na yin/_me de ni 'byung ba khon na rang gi bdag nyid dang
[\[130b.3\]]gzhan gyi bdag nyid gsal bar byed do zhes smra ba de ni 'thad pa ma yin no/_/ci'i phyir zhe na/_me 'byung ba nyid na mun pa dang phrad pa med pa yin te/_ma phrad pa'i phyir de sel bar mi byed do/_/mun pa ma bsal ba'i phyir gsal bar yang mi byed do/_/'di ltar gzhan yang /_
[\[130b.4\]]yang na me dang ma phrad kyang /_/mun pa sel bar byed na ni/_/'di na yod pa gang yin pas/_/'jig rten khams kun mun sel 'gyur/_/'on te me ni mun pa dang [#]phrad par yang sel bar byed do snyam du sems na/_'o na ni de [#]ma phrad par 'dra bas 'di na gnas pa'i mes 'jig
[\[130b.5\]]rten gyi khams thams cad na gnas pa'i mun pa sel bar 'gyur ba zhig na/_de ni de ltar yang ma yin pas de'i phyir me ni mun pa dang ma phrad par sel bar byed par 'dod pa gang yin pa de mi rung ngo /_/'di ltar gzhan yang /_gal te rang las tshad ma grub/_/gzhal bya rnams
[\[130b.6\]]la ma ltos par/_/khyod kyi tshad ma 'grub 'gyur 'dir[#]/_/gzhan la mi ltos rang 'grub 'gyur/_/gal te me bzhin du rang las tshad ma grub po snyam du sems na/_gzhal bar bya ba'i don rnams la ma ltos par yang tshad ma rnams rab tu 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/ci'i phyir zhe
[\[130b.7\]]na/_rang las grub pa ni gzhan la ltos [#]pa ma yin no/_/'on te ltos na ni rang las grub pa ma yin no/_/'dir smras pa/_gal te tshad ma rnams gzhal bar bya ba'i [#]don rnams la ni/_mi ltos [#]na skyon cir 'gyur zhe na/_'dir bshad pa/_gal te gzhal bya'i [#]don rnams la/_/
[\[131a\]]
[\[131a.1\]]ma ltos khyod kyi tshad ma 'grub/_/tshad ma 'di rnams kho na ni/_/gang gi'ang [#]yin par mi 'gyur ro/_/gal te tshad ma rnams gzhal bar bya ba don rnams la mi ltos par rab tu 'grub pa yin no zhe na/_de lta na [#]ni khyod kyis [#]tshad ma 'di rnams gang gi
[\[131a.2\]]phyir tshad ma yang ma yin pa'i skyon de lta bur 'gyur ro/_/'on te tshad ma rnams don 'ga' zhig gi yin no zhe na/_de gzhal bar bya ba'i don rnams la mi ltos par tshad ma rnams su 'gyur ba ma yin no/_/'on te ltos nas de rnams 'grub/_/'dod na de la skyon cir
[\[131a.3\]]'gyur/_/ma grub gzhan la mi ltos pas/_/grub pa sgrub par byed pa yin/_/'on te gzhal [#]bar bya ba'i don rnams la ltos nas tshad ma rnams 'grub pa [#]yin par 'dod do zhe na/_de lta na ni don ma grub pa ni ltos pa med pa yin te/_lha sbyin [#]ma grub pa na ni don 'ga'
[\[131a.4\]]la yang ltos pa ma yin pas khyod kyis [#]tshad ma gzhi 'gyur ba 'grub [#]par byed pa yin no/_/grub pa sgrub par byed pa yang 'dod pa ma yin te/_byas pa byed par mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro/_/'di ltar gzhan yang /_gal te yong ye gzhal bya la/_/ltos [#]nas tshad ma
[\[131a.5\]]grub yin na/_/tshad ma rnams la ma ltos [#]par/_/gzhal bar bya ba 'grub par 'gyur/_/gal te tshad ma rnams ni gzhal bar bya ba rnams la ltos nas so zhe na/_de tshad ma rnams la ltos nas gzhal bar bya ba ma grub [#]par mi 'gyur ro/_/ci'i phyir zhe na/_bsgrub
[\[131a.6\]]par bya ba ni sgrub par byed pa sgrub [#]par mi byed la/_tshad ma rnams kyis [#]sgrub par byed pa yang gzhal bya rnams yin no [#]zhes grag go/_/'di ltar gzhan yang /_gal te tshad ma rnams la ni/_/ma ltos par yang gzhal bya 'grub/_/gang phyir khyod kyi de grags pa/_/tshad ma grub
[\[131a.7\]]pas ci zhig bya/_/gal te tshad ma rnams la ma ltos par gzhal bar bya ba rnams 'grub po snyam du sems na/_ci de khyod kyi tshad ma grub par yongs su brtag [#]pas ci zhig bya/_/ci'i phyir zhe na/_gang gi don du khyod kyi tshad ma de rnams yongs su brtag [#]pa'i gzhal bar bya ba'i
[\[131b\]]
[\[131b.1\]]don de rnams [#]ni tshad ma rnams med par yang grub pa yin pas de la khyod kyi tshad ma rnams kyis ci zhig bya/_ci ste khyod kyi tshad ma rnams/_/gzhal bya rnams la ltos nas 'grub/_/de ltar [#]khyod kyi tshad ma rnams/_/gzhal bya nges par bzlog par 'gyur/_/ci
[\[131b.2\]]ste sngar smras pa'i skyon du 'gyur ba na mi rung ngo snyam nas tshad ma rnams ni gzhal bar bya ba'i don rnams la ltos pa yin no snyam du sems na de lta na ni khyod kyi tshad ma dang gzhal bar bya ba rnams bzlog par 'gyur te/_khyod kyi tshad ma rnams kyang gzhal bar bya bar 'gyur ro[#]/_/
[\[131b.3\]]gzhal bar bya ba rnams kyis rab tu bsgrub pa'i phyir ro/_/gzhal bar bya ba yang [#]tshad ma rnams su 'gyur te/_tshad ma rnams sgrub par byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro/_/'on te khyod kyis [#]tshad grub pas/_/gzhal bar bya ba 'grub 'gyur la/_/gzhal bya grub pas tshad grub na/_/
[\[131b.4\]]khyod kyis [#]gnyi ga'ang 'grub mi 'gyur/_/'on te tshad ma grub pas gzhal bar bya ba 'grub par 'gyur te/_tshad ma la ltos pa'i phyir ro/_/gzhal bar bya ba 'grub pas kyang tshad ma 'grub par 'gyur te/_gzhal bar bya ba la ltos pa'i phyir ro snyam du sems na/_de lta na ni
[\[131b.5\]]khyod kyis [#]gnyi ga yang 'grub par mi 'gyur ro/_/ci'i phyir zhe na/_gal te tshad mas gzhal bya 'grub/_/gzhal bya de dag rnams kyis kyang /_/de dag bsgrub [#]par bya yin na/_/de dag ji ltar bsgrub [#]par 'gyur/_/gal te tshad ma rnams kyis ni gzhal bar bya ba rnams 'grub
[\[131b.6\]]par byed la/_gzhal bar bya ba de dag rnams kyis kyang tshad ma de dag bsgrub par bya ba yin no zhe na/_'o na gzhal bar bya ba ma grub pa rnams kyi rgyu rab tu ma grub pa'i phyir gzhal bar bya ba ma grub pa dag ji ltar bsgrub [#]par 'gyur/_gal te gzhal byas tshad ma 'grub/_tshad
[\[131b.7\]]ma de dag rnams kyis kyang /_/de dag bsgrub [#]par bya yin na/_/de dag ji ltar bsgrub [#]par 'gyur/_/gal te yang gzhal bar bya ba rnams 'grub par 'gyur la/_tshad ma de rnams kyis kyang gzhal bar bya ba de dag bsgrub par bya ba yin no zhe na/_'o na tshad ma ma grub pa [# ]
[\[132a\]]
[\[132a.1\]]rnams kyi rgyu yin na rgyu [#]rab tu ma grub pa'i phyir tshad ma ma grub pa dag ji ltar bsgrub [#]par 'gyur/_gal te pha yis bu bskyed bya/_/gal te bu de nyid kyis kyang /_/ci ste pha de bskyed bya na/_/de [#]ni gang gis gang bskyed smros/_/ji ltar 'ga' zhig na re phas
[\[132a.2\]]bu bskyed par bya ba yin la/_pha de yang bu de nyid kyis bskyed par bya ba yin no zhes zer na/_da de na gang gis gang bskyed par smros shig ces bya ba de bzhin du khyod na re tshad ma rnams kyis gzhal bar bya ba dag bsgrub par bya ba yin la/_tshad ma de dag nyid kyang gzhal bar bya ba
[\[132a.3\]]de dag nyid kyis bsgrub [#]par bya ba yin no zhes zer ba/_da de na khyod kyis [#]gang dag gis gang dag rab tu bsgrub par bya ba yin no[#]/_/de dag gnyi ga'ang pha dang bu'i/_/mtshan nyid 'dzin pas de yi phyir/_/de la kho bo the tshom gyur/_/de na pha gang bu gang smros/_/gang gi phyir [# ]
[\[132a.4\]]pha dang bu sngar bstan pa de gnyis las/_bu ni gang pha ni gang de gnyi ga yang skyed par byed pa yin pa'i phyir pha'i mtshan nyid 'dzin par byed pa yin la/_bskyed par bya ba yin pa'i phyir bu'i mtshan nyid 'dzin pa yin pas 'di la kho bo the tshom du gyur na de la pha ni gang bu ni gang zhes bya
[\[132a.5\]]ba de bzhin du khyod kyis [#]tshad ma dang gzhal bar bya ba gang dag yin pa de dag kyang de ni tshad ma dag ni gang yin/_gzhal bar bya ba dag ni gang yin/_'di dag gnyi ga yang rab tu sgrub [#]par byed pa yin pa'i phyir tshad ma dag yin la/_bsgrub par bya ba dag yin pa'i phyir
[\[132a.6\]]gzhal bar bya ba yin pas 'di la kho bo the tshom du gyur [#]na tshad ma dag ni gang yin gzhal bar bya ba dag ni gang yin/_tshad ma rnams ni rang nyid kyis/_/'grub min phan tshun gyis min pa'am/_/tshad ma gzhan gyis ma yin la/_/gzhal byas ma yin rgyu med min/_/rang gis
[\[132a.7\]]te mngon sum ni [#]mngon sum de nyid kyis dang /_rjes su dpag pa ni rjes su dpag pa de nyid kyis dang /_lung ni lung de nyid kyis dang /_dpes gzhal ba ni dpes 'jal ba de nyid kyis rab tu mi 'grub la phan tshun gyis te/_mngon sum ni rjes su dpag pa dang /_dpes 'jal ba
[\[132b\]]
[\[132b.1\]]dang /_lung rnams kyis dang /_rjes su dpag pa ni mngon sum dang /_dpe 'jal ba dang /_lung rnams kyis dang /_dpes 'jal ba ni mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa dang /_lung rnams kyis dang /_lung ni mngon sum dang /_rjes su dpag pa dang /_dpes
[\[132b.2\]]'jal bas kyang ma yin la/_rang gi ji lta ba bzhin du/_mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa dang /_dpes 'jal ba dang /_lung rnams kyis ni mngon sum dang /_rjes su dpag pa dang /_dpes 'jal ba dang /_lung gzhan rnams kyis kyang ma yin la/_gzhal
[\[132b.3\]]bar bya ba rang dang gzhan gyis [#]bsdus pa mtha' dag dang /_re res kyang ma yin la/_rgyu med pas kyang ma yin la/_kun bsdus pas kyang ma yin no/_/gtan tshigs sngar bstan pa de dag ni/_nyi shu'am/_sum cu'am/_bzhi bcu'am/_sum cu rtsa drug gis kyang
[\[132b.4\]]mi bsgrub [#]na/_de la gang khyod kyis gzhal bar bya ba'i dngos po rnams ni tshad mas khong du chud par bya ba yin pa'i phyir dngos po gzhal bar bya ba de dag kyang yod la/_khyod kyi tshad ma gang dag gis dngos po gzhal bar bya ba dag yang dag par khong du chud pa'i tshad ma de dag
[\[132b.5\]]kyang yod do zhes smras pa gang yin pa de mi rung ngo /_/gzhan yang khyod kyis/_skye bo chos kyi gnas skabs mkhas/_/dge ba dag gi chos rnams la/_/dge ba'i rang bzhin yin par ni/_/sems shing lhag ma rnams dang yang /_/zhes smras pa gang yin pa de la bshad
[\[132b.6\]]par bya ste/_chos kyi gnas skabs rab mkhas pa/_/dge ba yi ni chos rnams kyi/_/dge ba'i rang bzhin smra ba gang /_/de ltar rab phye brjod bya yin/_/chos kyi gnas skabs la mkhas pa [#]dge ba'i chos kyi dge ba'i rang gi ngo bo sems pa de yang khyod kyis [#]rab tu phye ste/_
[\[132b.7\]]'di ni dge ba'i rang gi [#]ngo bo yin/_'di dag ni dge ba'i chos de dag yin te/_'di ni dge ba de [#]rnam par shes pa yin/_'di ni dge ba de rnam par shes pa'i rang gi ngo bo yin/_de bzhin du thams cad la bstan par bya ba yin no/_de yang de ltar [#]ma bstan pas de'i phyir rang
[\[133a\]]
[\[133a.1\]]gi ngo bo [#]ji lta ba bzhin du chos rnams kyi rang gi ngo bo bstan to zhes smras pa gang yin pa de mi rung ngo /_/'di ltar gzhan yang /_gal te dge ba'i chos rnams kyi[#]/_/dge ba'i rang gi ngo bo de/_/brten nas skye na de lta na/_/gzhan dngos rang ngor ji ltar 'gyur/_/
[\[133a.2\]]gal te dge ba'i chos rnams kyi rang gi ngo bo ni rgyu dang rkyen tshogs pa la brten nas skye'o zhe na/_de gzhan gyi dngos po la brten nas skyes pa yin na/_dge ba'i chos rnams kyi rang gi ngo bor [#]ji ltar 'gyur/_mi dge ba la sogs pa dag la yang de bzhin du sbyar ro/_/de la gang gi
[\[133a.3\]]phyir dge ba'i chos rnams kyi dge ba'i rang gi ngo bo yang bstan la/_de bzhin du mi dge ba la sogs pa'i chos rnams kyi [#]mi dge ba la sogs pa'i rang gi ngo bo [#]yang bstan pa yin no zhes smras pa gang yin pa de mi rung ngo /_/'di ltar gzhan yang /_'on te dge ba'i chos rnams kyi/_/
[\[133a.4\]]rang gi ngo bo de 'ga' la'ang /_/ma brten skye na de lta na'ang [#]/_/tshangs par spyod la gnas mi 'gyur/_/'on te dge ba'i chos rnams kyi dge ba'i rang gi ngo bo ni 'ga' la'ang ma brten par skye la/_mi dge ba la sogs pa dag gi yang de lta bu yin no snyam du sems na/_de lta na ni
[\[133a.5\]]tshangs par spyod pa la gnas par mi 'gyur ro/_/ci'i phyir zhe na/_de lta yin na ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba btang ba yin no/_/rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba gtang [#]ba'i phyir/_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mthong ba btang ba yin te/_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yod
[\[133a.6\]]pa ma yin pa ni mthong ba ste/_dmigs par 'thad pa ma yin no/_/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mthong ba med na/_chos mthong ba med pa yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis ni dge slong sus rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba mthong ba des chos mthong ngo zhes gsungs so/_/
[\[133a.7\]]chos mthong ba med pa'i phyir tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa med pa yin no/_/yang na rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba btang bas sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba btang ba yin te/_sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yin pas so/_/sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba
[\[133b\]]
[\[133b.1\]]btang bas sdug bsngal btang ba yin te/_kun 'byung ba med na gang las sdug bsngal kun 'byung bar 'gyur/_sdug bsngal gtang [#]ba'i phyir dang /_kun 'byung ba gtang [#]ba'i phyir dang [#]/_sdug bsngal 'gog pa btang ba yin te/_sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba gnyis med
[\[133b.2\]]na gang zhig spangs pas 'gog par 'gyur bas so/_/sdug bsngal 'gog pa med na gang zhig thob par bya ba'i phyir sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam du 'gyur/_des na 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dag med par 'gyur te/_de med pa'i phyir dge sbyong gi [#]tshul gyi
[\[133b.3\]]'bras bu med par 'gyur te/_bden pa mthong ba las dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu rnams yang dag par 'thob pas so/_/dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu rnams med pas tshangs par spyod pa la gnas par mi 'gyur ro/_/'di ltar gzhan yang /_rgyu mi ldan pa rtag
[\[133b.4\]]pa'i phyir/_/chos rnams thams cad rtag par 'gyur/_/chos sam chos ma yin med cing /_/'jig rten pa yi tha snyad med/_/de lta yin na rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba gtong ba de la skyon cir [#]'gyur zhe na/_chos med pa dang /_chos ma yin pa med pa dang /_'jig
[\[133b.5\]]rten pa'i tha snyad rnams med par 'gyur ro/_/ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di thams cad ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yin na rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba de med na gang las 'byung bar 'gyur/_gzhan yang rang gi ngo bo dang bcas pa dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ma yin pa dang /_
[\[133b.6\]]rgyu med pa las byung ba dang rtag par 'gyur te/_rgyu med pa rnams ni rtag pa nyid yin pa'i phyir dang /_de la tshangs par spyod pa la [#]gnas pa ma yin pa de nyid du yang [#]'gyur ro/_/grub pa'i mtha' dang yang 'gal te/_ci'i phyir zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'du byed thams cad
[\[133b.7\]]ni mi rtag pa'o zhes bshad pa yin no/_/de dag ni rang gi ngo bo nyid dang bcas pa'i rtag pa nyid kyis rtag pa yin no/_/mi dge ba dang lung ma bstan/_/nges 'byin stsogs la'ang skyon de bzhin/_/de bas khyod kyi 'dus byas kun/_/'dus ma byas pa nyid du 'gyur/_/[#]dge ba'i
[\[134a\]]
[\[134a.1\]]chos rnams la rtag pa de bstan pa gang yin pa de nyid mi dge ba rnams dang /_lung du ma bstan pa rnams la yang yod/_de nyid nges par 'byin pa la sogs pa la yang yod do/_/de bas na khyod kyi 'dus byas 'di thams cad 'dus ma byas su 'gyur
[\[134a.2\]]ro/_/ci'i phyir zhe na/_rgyu med na skye ba dang gnas pa dang 'jig pa dag med pa'i phyir ro/_/de med na 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid med pa'i phyir thams cad 'dus ma byas su 'gyur ro/_/de la dge ba la sogs pa dag gi dngos po dag gi rang gi ngo bo yod pa'i phyir dngos po
[\[134a.3\]]thams cad stong pa ma yin no zhes smras pa gang yin pa de mi rung ngo /_/gzhan yang khyod kyis/_gal te chos kyi rang bzhin med/_/rang bzhin med ces bya ba'i ming /_/de yang de bzhin med 'gyur te/_/gzhi med ming ni med pas so/_/zhes smras pa gang yin pa 'di la
[\[134a.4\]]bshad par bya ste/_gang zhig rang bzhin bcas pa zhes/_/ming ni yod par smra ba la/_/de ltar ming gi [#]lan btab kyis/_/nga ni ming yod mi smra'o/_/gang zhig ming 'di [#]rang bzhin dang bcas pa yin no zhes ming yod par smra ba de la khyod kyis lan gdab par bya ba yin gyi/_gal
[\[134a.5\]]te ming can gyi rang bzhin de med na/_de'i phyir ming de yang rang bzhin yod pa ma yin par bya dgos te/_yod pa ma yin pa la ni ming gi rang bzhin yod par mi 'gyur bas nged cag kyang ming gi rang bzhin yod par mi smra'o/_/de bas na dngos po rnams kyi rang bzhin yang med pa'i phyir
[\[134a.6\]]ming gi rang bzhin yang med pa yin no/_/de'i phyir stong pa yin no/_/stong pa nyid yin pa'i phyir yod pa ma yin pas de la khyod kyis ming yod pa'i phyir rang gi ngo bo yod do zhes smras pa gang yin pa de mi rung ngo /_/'di ltar gzhan yang /_med la ming med ces gang 'di/_/
[\[134a.7\]]ci de yod pa'am med pa yin/_/gal te yod pa'am med pa yin/_/khyod kyis smras pa gnyi ga'ang nyams/_/med pa la ming med do zhes bya ba gang yin pa 'di ci ming med pa de yod pa yin nam 'on te med pa yin/_gal te ming de yod pa zhig gi yin nam/_gal te
[\[134b\]]
[\[134b.1\]]med pa zhig gi yin na dam bcas pa gnyi ga yang nyams par 'gyur te/_de la gal te re zhig ming med pa zhes bya ba'i ming yod pa [#]yin no zhe na/_ming med do zhes bya ba'i [#]dam bcas pa nyams par 'gyur te/_da ni de [#]med pa ma yin te/_da ni de yod pas so ci ste ming med pa zhes
[\[134b.2\]]bya ba med pa [#]yin no zhe na/_med pa la ni ming med do/_/de bas na ming gi rang bzhin yod do zhes khyod kyis dam bcas pa gang yin pa de nyams pa yin no/_/'di ltar gzhan yang /_dngos po dag ni thams cad kyi[#]/_/stong pa nyid ni sngar bstan pas/_/de phyir dam bcas
[\[134b.3\]]med par yang /_/klan ka gang yin de tshol byed/_/'dir nged cag gi [#]sngar dngos po thams cad kyi stong pa nyid rgya cher bstan pas der ming yang stong pa nyid du bstan pa yin no/_/de'i phyir dam bcas pa med par yang khyod klan ka 'di tshol bar byed kyi/_nged ming yod do zhes mi
[\[134b.4\]]smra'o/_gzhan yang khyod kyis/_'on te 'di ltar rang bzhin yod/_/de ni chos la med ce na/_/chos rnams med par rang bzhin te/_/gang gi yin par de bstan rigs/_/zhes smras pa gang yin pa 'di la bshad par bya ste/_'on te rang bzhin zhig yod la/_/de ni chos la med
[\[134b.5\]]do zhes/_/dogs pa bsu na smra ba 'di/_/dogs pa gang yin de med do/_/nged [#]ni chos rnams kyi rang bzhin yang 'gog par mi byed la/_chos las [#]ma gtogs pa'i [#]don 'ga' zhig gi rang bzhin yin par [#]yang khas mi len no/_/de lta yin na 'on te chos rnams rang bzhin med
[\[134b.6\]]pa yin na/_rang bzhin te chos las [#]ma gtogs pa don gzhan gang zhig gi yin pa de bstan pa'i rigs so zhes bya ba'i khyod kyi klan ka [#]thag bsrings pa yin pas klan kar mi 'gyur ba ma yin nam/_gzhan yang khyod kyis/_gang phyir khyim na bum pa de/_/med ces yod pa nyid la
[\[134b.7\]]'gog_/mthong ste de phyir khyod kyi 'di[#]/_/yod pa'i rang bzhin 'gog pa yin/_/zhes smras pa gang yin pa 'di la bshad par bya ste/_gal te yod la 'gog yin na/_/'o na stong nyid rab 'grub ste/_/dngos [#]rnams rang bzhin med nyid la/_/khyod ni 'gog par byed pas so/_/
[\[135a\]]
[\[135a.1\]]gal te yod pa kho na la 'gog par byed pa yin gyi/_med pa la ni ma yin no/_/khyed kyang dngos po thams cad kyi rang bzhin med pa nyid 'gog par byed pa yin pas 'o na dngos po thams cad kyi rang bzhin med pa nyid rab tu grub pa ma yin nam/_khyod kyi gtan_
[\[135a.2\]]tshigs 'gog par byed pa yod pa'i phyir dang /_dngos po thams cad kyi rang bzhin med pa nyid bkag pa'i phyir stong pa nyid rab tu grub pa yin no/_/stong nyid gang la khyod 'gog pa'i/_/stong nyid de yang med yin na/_/'o na yod la 'gog yin zhes/_/smras pa de nyams ma yin
[\[135a.3\]]nam/_/ci ste khyod dngos po thams cad kyi rang bzhin med pa nyid de/_stong pa nyid 'gog par byed la [#]stong pa de yang med pa yin na/_'o na yod pa la 'gog par byed kyi med pa la ni ma yin no zhes khyod kyis dam bcas pa gang yin pa de nyams pa yin no/_/'di ltar gzhan yang /_
[\[135a.4\]]dgag bya ci yang med pas na/_/nga ni ci yang mi 'gog go/_/de [#]phyir 'gog par byed do zhes/_/skur [#]pa de ni khyod kyis btab/_/gal te ngas ci zhig 'gog par byed na ni de'i phyir khyod kyis de skad [#]kyang smra ba'i rigs na gang gi phyir dgag par bya ba ci yang med pas nga ni cung zad kyang
[\[135a.5\]]'gog par mi byed do/_/de'i phyir dngos po thams cad stong pa yin te/_dgag par bya ba dang /_'gog par byed pa yod pa ma yin pa las 'gog par byed do zhes khyod kyis skur [#]pa thog tu ma bab pa de btab bo/_/gzhan yang khyod kyis/_ci ste rang bzhin de med na/_/khyod
[\[135a.6\]]kyi tshig des ci zhig dgag_/med pa yin na tshig med par/_/'gog pa rab tu grub [#]pa yin/_/zhes smras pa gang yin pa de 'di la bshad par bya ste/_tshig med par yang med pa yi/_/'gog pa 'grub par 'gyur zhes pa/_/de la tshig ni med ces par/_/go bar
[\[135a.7\]]byed kyi skye sel min/_/khyod kyi tshig dag med par yang ste/_tshig ma gtogs par yang med pa'i 'gog pa 'grub na/_de la ci'i dngos po thams cad rang bzhin med pa yin no [#]zhes smras pa'i khyod kyi tshig des ci zhig byed ces smras pa gang yin pa 'di la bshad par bya ste/_dngos po
[\[135b\]]
[\[135b.1\]]thams cad rang bzhin med pa'o zhes bya ba'i tshig 'di ni dngos po rnams rang bzhin med pa nyid du byed pa ma yin gyi/_'on kyang rang bzhin med pa la dngos po rnams rang bzhin med pa'o zhes go bar byed pa yin no/_/dper na 'ga' zhig na re lha sbyin [#]khyim na med bzhin du lha [#]sbyin khyim na
[\[135b.2\]]yod do zhes zer ba dang /_de ni de la kha cig na re med do zhes zer ba na/_tshig des lha sbyin [#]med par mi byed kyi lha sbyin [#]khyim na mi srid par ston pa 'ba' zhig tu zad do/_/de bzhin du dngos po rnams kyi rang bzhin med do zhes bya ba'i tshig de yang dngos po rnams kyi rang bzhin med pa nyid du
[\[135b.3\]]byed pa ma yin gyi/_'on kyang dngos po thams cad rang bzhin med pa sgyu ma'i skyes bu dang 'dra bar skyes bu yang dag pa'i ngo bo dang bral ba rnams la rmongs pa'i phyir/_byis pa skye bo ma rig pas rmongs pa rnams kyi rang bzhin dang bcas pa nyid du sgro btags pa rnams la rang bzhin/_
[\[135b.4\]]yod pa ma yin par go bar byed pa yin pas de la rang bzhin yod pa ma yin na tshig med par yang ste [#]tshig ma gtogs par yang rang bzhin yod pa ma yin par rab tu grub pa yin no/_/rang bzhin med do zhes bya ba'i tshig des ci zhig byed ces khyod kyis smras pa gang yin pa de rigs pa ma yin
[\[135b.5\]]no/_/gzhan yang /_byis pa rnams ni smig rgyu la/_/ji ltar log par chur 'dzin ltar/_/de bzhin khyod kyis log par 'dzin/_/yod pa yin la dgag par bya/_/zhes bshad pa la sogs pa yang khyod kyis tshigs su bcad pa bzhi smras pa gang yin pa 'di la bshad par bya ste/_
[\[135b.6\]]smig rgyu'i dpe la khyod kyis kyang /_/'gro ba chen pos [#]smras pa gang /_/der yang ci nas dpe de 'thad/_/gtan la dbab la [#]mnyan par gyis/_/khyod kyis smig rgyu'i dpe de la 'gro ba chen po smras pa gang yin pa der yang dpe de ci nas kyang 'thad pa gtan la dbab pa gang yin pa de nyon
[\[135b.7\]]cig_/gal te 'dzin de rang bzhin yod/_/brten nas 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/'dzin pa gang zhig brten nas 'byung /_/de nyid stong nyid ma yin nam/_/gal te smig rgyu la chu'o snyam du 'dzin pa rang bzhin gyis yod pa zhig yin na/_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yin par mi 'gyur
[\[136a\]]
[\[136a.1\]]ba zhig na/_gang gi phyir smig rgyu la yang brten/_phyin ci log gi lta ba dang /_tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa la ma [#]brten nas byung ba de'i phyir rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yin no/_/gang gi phyir rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yin pa de'i phyir rang bzhin
[\[136a.2\]]gyis [#]stong pa yin te/_sngar ji skad bstan pa de dang [#]'dra'o/_/'di ltar gzhan yang /_gal te 'dzin pa rang bzhin yod/_/'dzin pa de la su zhig bzlog_/lhag ma rnams la'ang tshul de yin/_/de phyir klan ka de med do/_/gal te smig rgyu la chur 'dzin pa 'di rang bzhin
[\[136a.3\]]gyis yod pa zhig yin na/_de la sus kyang bzlog [#]par mi 'gyur te/_ji ltar me'i tsha ba nyid dang /_chu'i gsher ba nyid dang /_nam mkha'i [#]mi bsgrib pa nyid bzhin du rang bzhin ni bzlog par mi nus pa yin na de ni bzlog par yang mthong ngo /_/de'i phyir 'dzin pa de rang bzhin
[\[136a.4\]]gyis med pa yin no/_/'di ji lta ba bzhin na gzung [#]ba la sogs pa chos lhag ma lnga po rnams la yang tshul de lta bur rtogs [#]par bya ba yin pas de la drug [#]tshan drug yod pa'i phyir dngos po thams cad stong pa ma yin no zhes smra ba gang yin pa de mi rung ngo /_/gzhan yang /_khyod
[\[136a.5\]]la gtan tshigs ma grub ste/_/rang bzhin med phyir khyod gtan tshigs/_/gang la yod do [#]khyod don de/_/gtan tshigs med par 'grub mi 'thad/_/ces bya ba 'dir bshad par bya ste/_'di la snga mas gtan tshigs med/_/lan btab bsgrub byar mtshungs phyir ro/_/snga ma smig
[\[136a.6\]]rgyu'i dpes bzlog pa/_/bsgrub tshe smras pa gang yin pa'o/_/da ltar gyi 'gro ba 'di dag dang sngar bstan pas gtan tshigs med pa'i yang lan btab par rigs par bya ste/_sngar gtan tshigs bstan pa drug tshan 'gag par byed pa'i 'gro ba gang yin pa de nyid 'dir yang 'gro bar bya ba
[\[136a.7\]]yin no/_/gzhan yang /_'di ltar rang bzhin yod min na/_/gal te 'gog snga [#]dgag 'phyi zhes/_/zer na 'thad pa ma yin la[#]/_/'phyi dang cig car mi 'thad do/_/zhes smras pa gang yin pa 'di la bshad par bya ste/_dus gsum gtan tshigs gang yod sngar/_/lan btab
[\[136b\]]
[\[136b.1\]]de dang mtshungs phyir ro/_/dus gsum khyed kyi [#]gtan tshigs ni/_/stong nyid smra ba rnams la rung /_/gtan tshigs dus gsum 'gog par byed pa zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni lan btab zin te/_gang gi phyir zhe na [#]bsgrub par bya ba dang mtshungs pa'i phyir ro/_/'di ltar khyod kyi
[\[136b.2\]]tshig gis 'gog pa dus gsum du yang mi 'thad par 'gyur ba'i 'gog pa bzhin du dgag par bya ba yang de yin no/_/de'i phyir 'gog pa dang dgag par bya ba med na 'gog pa bkag go snyam du khyod sems pa gang yin pa de mi rung ngo /_/'gog pa dus gsum la zhes bya ba'i gtan
[\[136b.3\]]tshigs dus gsum 'gog par byed pa zhes bya ba gang yin pa de nyid ni dngos po thams cad 'gog par byed pa zhes bya ba gang yin pa'i phyir stong pa nyid smra ba rnams la yod pa nyid yin gyi/_khyod la ni med do/_/yang na 'di ji ltar lan btab pa yin zhe na/_dgag bya ci yang med pas
[\[136b.4\]]na/_/nga ni ci yang mi 'gog go/_/de phyir 'gog par byed do zhes/_/skur ba de ni khyod kyis btab/_/ces lan btab pa yin no/_/'on te dus gsum car du yang 'gog pa grub pa yin pas [#]te/_sngon gyi dus kyi rgyu dang /_phyi ma'i dus kyi rgyu dang /_cig car gyi dus kyi rgyu
[\[136b.5\]]yang mthong bas so/_/de la sngon gyi dus kyi rgyu ni ji lta bu'i pha bzhin no/_/phyi ma'i dus kyi [#]ni ji ltar slob dpon gyis [#]slob ma bzhin no/_/cig car gyi dus kyi ni ji ltar snang ba'i sgron ma bzhin no snyam du sems na de ni de lta ma yin par tshul 'di la skyon sngar bstan zin to[#]/_/gzhan
[\[136b.6\]]yang gal te de lta [#]yin na dgag pa srid par khyod kyis khas blangs la/_de ni ma grub pas khyod kyis dam bcas pa yang nyams pa yin no/_/rgyu [#]'dis rang bzhin 'gog pa yang grub pa yin no/_/gang la stong pa nyid srid pa/_/de la don rnams thams cad srid/_/gang la stong
[\[136b.7\]]nyid mi srid pa/_/de la ci yang mi srid do/_/gang la stong nyid 'di srid pa de la 'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i don thams cad [#]srid pa yin no/_/ci'i phyir zhe na/_gang la srid pa de la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_dge
[\[137a\]]
[\[137a.1\]]sbyong gi 'bras bu dang /_khyad par du rtogs [#]pa thams cad srid do/_/gang la khyad par du rtogs pa thams cad srid pa de la dkon mchog gsum po/_/sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun srid do/_/gang la rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba srid pa de la chos
[\[137a.2\]]dang /_chos kyi rgyu dang /_chos kyi 'bras bu dang /_chos ma yin [#]pa dang /_chos ma yin pa'i rgyu dang /_chos ma yin pa'i 'bras bu srid do/_/gang la chos dang /_chos ma yin pa dang /_rgyu dang 'bras bu srid pa de la nyon mongs pa dang nyon mongs pa kun 'byung ba dang /_nyon mongs pa'i gzhi
[\[137a.3\]]rnams srid do/_/gang la sngar bstan pa de thams cad srid pa de la bde 'gro dang /_ngan 'gro rnam par gzhag [#]pa dang /_bde 'gro dang /_ngan 'gror 'gro ba dang /_bde 'gro dang /_ngan 'gror 'gro ba'i sems can dang /_bde 'gro dang /_ngan 'gro las 'da' ba dang /_bde 'gro dang /_
[\[137a.4\]]ngan 'gro las 'gro [#]ba'i thabs dang /_'jig rten pa'i tha snyad thams cad rnam par gzhag pa [#]yin te tshig gis ji snyed cig bstan par nus pas phyogs 'dis rang gis [#]rtogs par bya'o/_/'dir yang /_gang zhig stong dang rten 'byung dag_/dbu ma'i lam du don gcig
[\[137a.5\]]par/_/gsung mchog mtshungs pa med pa yi/_/sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rtsod pa bzlog pa'i rab tu byed pa'i 'grel pa sa dang po rab tu dga' ba la bzhugs pa slob dpon 'phags pa [#]nA gArdzu nas mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//[#]yod dam [#]med pa'i
[\[137a.6\]]rtsod pa smra ba mun bsal te/_/bstan zab gnyis med de bzhin nyid chos snang gyur nas/_/srid pa'i mngal du skyes pa'i 'jig rten ma lus pa/_/lha dang mi dang lha min thams cad dge bar shog_/dngos 'dzin gdon gyis brla mas pa yi/_/
[\[137a.7\]]rims nad rtag tu zlog [#]byed cing /_/'jig rten 'di yi mun sel ba/_/dri med mi g.yo rigs 'di yin//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyAn gar+b+ha dang /_lo tsA ba dpal brtsegs rak+Shi tas bsgyur te gtan la phab pa//_//[ #]
[\[137b\]]
[\[137b.1\]{D3833}#]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_ma hA yA na biM shi kA[#]/_bod skad du/_theg pa chen po nyi shu pa/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/chags med thugs su chud sangs rgyas/_/rjod byed brjod par bya ba min/_/thugs rjes rgyal ba
[\[137b.2\]]snang gyur pa/_/mthu bsam mi khyab phyag 'tshal lo/_/dam pa'i don du skye med phyir/_/de nyid du ni grol ba'ang med/_/mkha' bzhin sangs rgyas de bzhin te/_/sems can dang ni mtshan nyid gcig_/pha rol tshu rol skye med pas/_/rang bzhin mya ngan 'das pa'ang
[\[137b.3\]]med/_/de bzhin 'dus byas mngon par stong /_/kun mkhyen ye shes spyod yul yin/_/dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin no[#]/_/gzugs brnyan dang ni mtshungs par rtogs/_/rnam dag zhi ba'i ngo bo nyid/_/gnyis med de bzhin nyid du mnyam/_/bdag dang bdag med bden
[\[137b.4\]]min te/_/so so'i skye bos brtags pa yin/_/bde dang sdug bsngal ltos pa ste/_/nyon mongs rnams dang grol de bzhin/_/'gro ba rigs drug 'khor ba ru/_/mtho ris mchog dang bde ba dang /_/dmyal bar sdug bsngal chen po ste/_/de dag yul rnams nyams su
[\[137b.5\]]myong /_/mi dges mchog tu sdug bsngal zhing /_/dga' na mi rtag rgud pa yin/_/dge ba'i las rnams nyid kyis kyang /_/bzang po nyid du nges pa yin/_/skye med rtogs pas bskrun pa yis/_/dmyal la sogs pa snang ba ni/_/nyes pa nags kyi me bzhin bsreg_/_
[\[137b.6\]]sgyu ma ji lta ji lta bar/_/de bzhin sems can yul la spyod/_/'gro ba sgyu ma'i rang bzhin yin/_/de bzhin du ni brten nas byung /_/ji ltar ri mo mkhan gyis [#]gzugs/_/gnod sbyin 'jigs pa bris pa yis/_/de yis rang nyid skrag pa ltar/_/mi mkhas 'khor bar
[\[137b.7\]]de bzhin no/_/ji ltar rang gis 'dam g.yos pas/_/byis pa 'ga' zhig bying ba ltar/_/de bzhin rtog [#]pa'i 'dam bying bas/_/sems can rnams ni dbyung [#]mi nus/_/dngos med dngos por lta ba yis/_/sdug bsngal tshor ba nyams su myong /_/yul dang shes pa de dag tu/_/
[\[138a\]]
[\[138a.1\]]rnam par rtog [#]ba'i dug gis bcings/_/de dag snying po med mthong bas/_/shes rab snying rje'i yid kyis ni/_/sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas la sbyar bar bya/_/des kyang tshogs bsags kun rdzob tu/_/bla na med pa'i byang chub
[\[138a.2\]]thob/_/rtog pa'i 'ching ba rnams las grol/_/sangs rgyas de ni 'jig rten gnyen/_/ji ltar rten cing 'brel 'byung ba/_/gang gis yang dag don du gzigs/_/de yis 'gro ba stong par mkhyen/_/thog ma dbus dang tha ma spangs/_/de ltar mthong bas 'khor ba dang /_/
[\[138a.3\]]mya ngan 'das pa'ang de nyid min/_/nyon mongs pa yi rnam pa med/_/thog ma dbus mtha'i rang bzhin bsal/_/rmi lam nyams su myong ba bzhin/_/so sor rtog pas snang ma [#]yin/_/rmongs pa'i mun pa gnyid sad la/_/'khor ba rnams ni dmigs pa med/_/sgyu mas
[\[138a.4\]]sprul pa sgyu mar mthong /_/gang tshe 'dus pa de yi tshe/_/cung zad yod pa ma yin te/_/de ni chos rnams chos nyid yin/_/'di dag thams cad sems tsam ste[#]/_/sgyu ma lta bur gnas pa yin/_/dge dang mi dge las rnams kyis/_/de yis bzang ngan skye ba rnams/_/
[\[138a.5\]]sems kyi 'khor lo 'gags pa yis/_/chos rnams thams cad 'gag pa nyid/_/de phyir chos nyid bdag med cing /_/des na chos nyid rnam par dag_/dngos po 'am ni rang bzhin la/_/rtag tu bde bar 'du shes shing /_/rmongs pa'i mun pas bsgribs
[\[138a.6\]]pa [#]na/_/byis pa 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor 'khyam/_/rtog pa'i chu bos gang ba yi/_/'khor ba'i rgya mtsho chen po la/_/theg chen gru la mi zhon pa[#]/_/gang gis pha rol phyin par 'gyur/_/ma rig rkyen gyis byung ba 'di/_/yang dag 'jig rten mkhyen pa'i phyir/_/rnam
[\[138a.7\]]par rtog pa 'di dag ni/_/ci zhig las ni 'byung bar 'gyur/_/theg pa chen po nyi shu pa slob dpon klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po tsan+d+ra ku mA [#]ra dang /_dge slong shAkya 'od kyis bsgyur ba'o[#]//_//_
[\[138b\]]
[\[138b.1\]{D3834}#]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_ak+Sha ra sha ta ka_/bod skad du/_yi ge brgya pa/_'jam pa'i dpal rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dngos po rnams [#]gcig pa nyid ma yin no/_/gzhan pa nyid kyang de bzhin no/_/yod pa nyid du bsgrub par bya ba yin no/_/med pa
[\[138b.2\]]nyid kyang bsgrub par bya ba'o/_/rgyu yod pa ma yin no/_/ma yin te ltos pa'i phyir ro/_/'dod pas yod pa ma yin no/_/brda ma grub bo/_/gtan tshigs dag don med do/_/rang bzhin brjod par bya'o/_/gcig nyid la skyon yod do/_/gzhan nyid na dngos po med pa yin no/_/
[\[138b.3\]]'dzin par mi nus so/_/dngos po mthong ba ma yin no/_/yod pa ni bya ba ma yin no/_/de dag la skye ba med do/_/'dus byas med do/_/phyogs gcig tsam mo/_/rmi lam dang mtshungs so/_/ming ni dngos po ma yin no/_/bsgrub bya dang mtshungs so/_/yi ge brgya pa rdzogs
[\[138b.4\]]so//[ {D3835}]@#/_/yi ge brgya pa zhes bya ba'i 'grel pa/[ #]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_ak+Sha ra sha ti ka nA ma br-it+ti[#]/_bod skad du/_yi ge brgya pa zhes bya ba'i 'grel pa/_'jam pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/_/thams cad thams cad kyi bdag nyid do/_/zhes dam bca' ba gang ngam/_gang dag
[\[138b.5\]]gam/_gang rnams 'dod pa de dag gi gtan tshigs las grub par mi 'gyur gyi/_gtan tshigs nyid med par 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/'di snyam du thams cad thams cad kyi bdag nyid do zhes bya bar dam bca' ba ni/_gtan tshigs kho na las de yod par mtshungs pa'i phyir ro
[\[138b.6\]]zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs so/_/dpe gang zhe na/_bum pa dang snam bu la sogs pa bzhin no/_/ji ltar bum pa dang snam bu la sogs pa bzhin du dngos po thams cad kyang [#]yod pa nyid du mtshungs par 'jug ste/_de lta bas na dngos po rnams gcig par grub par 'dod do zhe na/_
[\[138b.7\]]smras pa/_dngos po rnams gcig pa ma yin no/_/'dir gtan tshigs gang yin pa de gcig [#]nyid kyi mtshan nyid du gyur pa zhig gam/_'on te ma yin/_gnyi ga ltar yang skyon yod do/_/gal te gcig pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid du gyur na ni de'i 'di'i gtan tshigs su 'gyur ba ma
[\[139a\]]
[\[139a.1\]]yin te/_dam bca' ba las gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/'on te 'di tha dad pa [#]yin na de lta na 'di dam bca' ba nyams te/_gtan tshigs las gzhan yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de lta bas na dngos po rnams gcig ma yin no/_/'dir smras pa/_gcig pa nyid
[\[139a.2\]]du 'dod pa de la skyon de yod kyi bdag cag ni gzhan nyid [#]'dod pa yin no zhe na/_smras pa/_gzhan pa nyid kyang med do/_/'dir [#]gzhan pa nyid la yang skyon 'di dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/_ji [#]lta zhe na/_gal te re zhig khyed cag gtan tshigs med par gzhan pa [#]nyid du 'dod na ni de'i tshe
[\[139a.3\]]nga'i yang gtan tshigs med pa kho nar gcig pa nyid du 'gyur ro/_/'on te gtan tshigs kho na las dngos po rnams gzhan pa nyid du'o zhes dam bcas pa 'di la/_da ni gtan tshigs brjod par bya'o/_/smras pa/_mtshan nyid tha dad pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs so/_/
[\[139a.4\]]dpe ni rta dang glang po la sogs pa bzhin te/_ji ltar rta dang glang po la sogs pa [#]dag mtshan nyid tha dad pas tha dad pa bzhin du dngos po thams cad kyang yin te/_de bas na dngos po rnams gzhan pa nyid du grub po zhe na/_smras pa/_gal te gtan tshigs 'di [#]yang mtshan nyid gzhan du gyur
[\[139a.5\]]na ni de'i tshe gtan tshigs de bsgrub bya dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro/_/gang bsgrub bya dang mtshungs pa de ni gtan tshigs ma yin par 'gyur te/_dam bca' ba las gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/'on te mtshan nyid gzhan pa nyid du gyur pa yin na ni de'i tshe dam bca' ba nyams
[\[139a.6\]]pa nyid du 'gyur ro/_/'dir smras pa/_gal te dngos po rnams gcig pa nyid dam/_/gzhan pa nyid ces bya bar ma grub pa de lta na yang yod pa nyid du grub ste/_de grub pa na dngos po rnams gcig pa nyid dam gzhan pa nyid gdon mi za bar grub par 'gyur ro zhe na/_'di la
[\[139a.7\]]brjod pa yod pa nyid bsgrub [#]par bya ba yin no/_/'dir gal te khyed cag gtan tshigs med pa las yod pa nyid yin na ni bdag cag gi med pa nyid kyang gtan tshigs med pa las 'grub par 'gyur te/_gtan tshigs med pa nyid du'o/_/'on te gtan tshigs las dngos po [# ]
[\[139b\]]
[\[139b.1\]]rnams yod pa'o zhes dam bcas pa'o[#]/_/de'i tshe 'dir gtan tshigs brjod par bya dgos so/_/smras pa/_mngon du dmigs pa'i phyir ro/_/dpe ci zhe na/_smras pa/_chos mi mthun pa ni nam mkha'i me tog bzhin te/_ji ltar nam mkha'i me tog dngos po med pas mi
[\[139b.2\]]dmigs te/_gang gi phyir de dang chos mi mthun pas bum pa dang snam bu dag la sogs pa'i dngos po rnams yang dag par dmigs pa de'i phyir dngos po rnams yod pa ma yin no zhe na/_smras pa/_'dir gtan tshigs gang yin pa de yod pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid du 'gyur ba zhig
[\[139b.3\]]gam/_'on te ma yin/_des cir 'gyur zhe na/_gal te yod pa [#]nyid du 'gyur na de'i bsgrub [#]bar bya ba dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro/_/'on te yod pa nyid las gzhan pa kho na yin pa de'i tshe yang dam bca' [#]nyams par 'gyur te/_de bas na yod pa nyid mi 'grub bo/_/'dir
[\[139b.4\]]smras pa/_yod pa nyid la bkag pa nyid kyis med pa nyid khas blangs pa yin te/_dper na smra ba po bdag gis de ring zas zhim po myong ngo zhes zer na/_'dir [#]don gyi shugs kyis sngar mi zhim par rtogs pa bzhin no zhe na/_smras pa/_med pa nyid du bsgrub [#]par bya ba'o/_/
[\[139b.5\]]gal te khyed cag med pa nyid gtan tshigs med pa nyid du 'dod na/_bdag cag kyang gtan tshigs med pa nyid kho nar [#]yod pa nyid du 'gyur ro/_/'di snyam du dngos po rnams med pa yin no zhes dam bca' ba 'di gtan tshigs nyid las yin par 'dod do/_/'dir gtan
[\[139b.6\]]tshigs gang yin zhe na/_rang bzhin med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs so/_/dpe ci zhe na/_dpe ni smig rgyu ste/_ji ltar gang gi phyir smig rgyu rang bzhin med pa'i phyir yod pa ma yin pa las skad cig tsam yang ma [#]yin pa de ltar snam bu la sogs pa rnams la yang snal
[\[139b.7\]]ma la sogs pa'i yan lag rnams kyis phye zhing gzigs na yod pa ma dmigs te/_de'i phyir dngos po rnams med pa zhes bya'o zhe na/_'dir gtan tshigs su nye bar bkod pa gang yin pa de ni [#]ci med pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid du 'gyur pa'am[#]/_'on te ma yin te[#]/_gal te
[\[140a\]]
[\[140a.1\]]med pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid du gyur na ni/_de lta na bsgrub par bya ba dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro/_/ci ste med pa las gzhan kho na yin na ni de'i tshe dam bca' ba nyams par 'gyur te/_de'i phyir med pa nyid kyang ma grub bo/_/'dir smras pa/_'dir 'jim pa dang /_
[\[140a.2\]]snal ma dang thags bzangs [#]la sogs pa dngos po rnams kyi rgyu [#]ma bkag pa de bas na dngos po rnams med do/_/smras pa/_rgyu yod pa ma yin no/_/'di la 'bras bu yod pa gang dag yin pa de dag gi rgyu ni yod pa ma yin[#]/_ci'i phyir zhe na/_dngos po yod pa bum pa dang snam bu la sogs
[\[140a.3\]]pa rnams kyi rgyu 'jim pa dang /_snal ma dang /_thags bzangs dang /_thag pa [#]la sogs la ma yin te yod pa'i phyir ro/_/gang dag 'bras bu med pa dag gi yang [#]rgyu yod pa ma yin te/_med pa'i phyir ro/_/gang dag 'bras bu yod pa dang med pa dag gi yang rgyu yod pa dang med pa [# ]
[\[140a.4\]]de dag gang yang rgyu yod par mi 'gyur te/_gnyi ga'i skyon du thal ba'i phyir ro/_/de la gang yod pa de ni yod pa'i phyir dang /_/gang med pa [#]de ni med pa'i phyir ro/_/gcig la gnyi ga srid pa yang 'gal ba'i phyir ro/_/gang gis [#]yod pa de'i mtshan nyid 'dzin pa des med pa ma
[\[140a.5\]]yin no/_/gang gis med pa de'i mtshan nyid 'dzin pa des yod pa ma yin no/_/de'i phyir de rnams kyi rgyu yang yod pa ma yin no/_/gang dag rgyu med pa nyid las yin pa de dag gi yang rgyu yod pa yin te/_rgyu med pa nyid las grub pa'i phyir ro/_/rgyu med pa [#]las grub pa yin no zhes
[\[140a.6\]]bya ba ni [#]de'i tshe yang 'di dag gi dam bca' ba nyams par 'gyur te/_rgyu dang byed rgyu dang rgyu mtshan zhes bya ba'i don gzhan ma yin no/_/de lta bas na rgyu yod pa'i phyir dngos po rnams yod do zhes gang brjod pa de ni ma yin no/_/'dir smras pa/_'di yang rgyu dgag pa byas pa nyid kyis
[\[140a.7\]]'bras bu bkag [#]pa'i phyir ro[#]/_/shugs kyis [#]rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyi ga [#]yang khas blangs par 'gyur te/_rab tu grub pa'i phyir dngos po thams cad grub bo zhes bya zhe na/_smras pa/_ma yin te ltos pa'i phyir ro/_/'dir khyed cag rnams kyis gnyi ga grub bo zhes gang brjod pa de
[\[140b\]]
[\[140b.1\]]ni ma yin no[#]/_/ci'i phyir zhe na/_ltos pa'i phyir ro/_/rgyu ni rgyu nyid du 'bras bu la ltos nas dang /_'bras bu yang 'bras bu nyid du rgyu la ltos nas yongs su btags te/_de ltar na phan tshun ltos [#]pa yin pa'i phyir gnyi ga'ang [#]rgyu nyid du thal bar 'gyur la/_gnyi ga rgyu nyid du
[\[140b.2\]]thal na yang 'bras bu med do/_/de med pa la rgyu med do/_/de bzhin du rang bzhin dang /_dbang phyug dang /_rdul phra rab dang /_phyogs dang /_dus la sogs pa thams cad rgyu ma yin te/_ltos pa'i phyir ro/_/'di rnams ni mi rtag pa nyid du yang 'gyur te/_ltos nas grub pa nyid
[\[140b.3\]]kyi phyir ro/_/byas pa nyid du yang thal bar 'gyur te/_de bas na mi rtag pa nyid dang /_rgyu med pa nyid dang /_byas pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur te/_de bas na rang bzhin dang /_dbang phyug dang /_rdul phra rab dang /_phyogs dang /_dus la sogs pa rnams mi 'grub ste/_rgyu nyid
[\[140b.4\]]la ltos pa'i phyir ro/_/'dir smras pa/_de ltar na ji ltar bdag cag rnams kyis brjod pa mi slu [#]ba'i nye bar gdags pa las gzhan la ni ma yin te [#]zhe na/_smras pa/_'dod pas yod pa ma yin no/_/'dir gal te 'dod pas grub par 'gyur na ni[#]/_de'i rigs pa spang ba'i [#]phyir
[\[140b.5\]]nga'i 'dod pa las khyod kyi yang yod pa gang yin pa de nga'i med pa'o/_/ci'i phyir zhe na/_'dod pa las grub pa'i phyir ro/_/ci ste khyed cag gi 'dod pa las grub kyi/_nga'i ni ma yin na de 'dir mi 'dra ba nyid la gtan tshigs khyad par can ma brjod pa'i phyir te/_de bas na 'dod
[\[140b.6\]]pa grub pa ma yin no/_/'dir smras pa/_'di ni bdag cag gi [#]brda las so zhe na/_smras pa/_brda ma grub po/_/'di ltar gang khyed cag gis brda ma grub pa ste/_ma grub pa la yang ji ltar sgrub byed du 'gyur te/_ma grub pa ni rigs pa dang /_rigs pa ma yin pa'i sgrub
[\[140b.7\]]byed ma yin no/_/de'i phyir brda ma grub pa yin no/_/rigs pa dang bral ba nyid kyis bstan bcos rnams la brjod par bya ba yod par smra ba po ni mi rnyed do/_/gzhan yang smras pa/_kha cig tu rigs pa yang brjod par bya ste/_ji skad du/_med pa [#]bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir dang /_
[\[141a\]]
[\[141a.1\]]nye bar len pa gzung [#]ba'i phyir dang /_thams cad la [#]'byung ba med pa'i phyir dang /_nus pa can ni [#]nus pa med pa'i phyir dang /_rgyu'i [#]ngo bo yin pa'i phyir 'bras bu yod pa yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa bshad pa lta bu'o/_/smras pa/_gtan tshigs dag
[\[141a.2\]]don med do/_/'dir khyed cag gi gtan tshigs gang yin pa de gal te bsgrub pa'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa de'i tshe/_nged kyi phyogs kyang grub par 'gyur ro/_/ci ste sun 'byin pa'i mtshan nyid du gyur na ni de'i tshe gnyi ga la yang skyon du 'gyur te/_dper na me ni gnyi ga la sreg
[\[141a.3\]]par byed kyi/_gcig la ni ma yin no/_/gzhan yang /_gal te gtan tshigs las gzhal bya grub na ni de'i tshe pha rol pos kyang gtan tshigs brjod par bya dgos te/_gnyi ga 'grub par yang mi 'dod de/_dper na khyed cag gi dam bca' ba ni sgra rtag ste/_lus can ma yin
[\[141a.4\]]pa'i phyir nam mkha' bzhin no/_/ji ltar nam mkha' [#]lus can ma yin pa'i phyir rtag pa de bzhin du sgra yang rtag ste/_de bas na sgra ni rtag par grub po zhes bya'o/_/de bzhin du gzhan yang brjod par bya ste/_bdag cag gi dam bca' ba 'di yin te/_sgra mi rtag ste byas pa'i phyir
[\[141a.5\]]bum pa bzhin no/_/ji ltar bum pa ni 'jim gong la sogs pa dang /_skyes bu'i rtsol ba las yang dag par skye bzhin pa ni byas pa'o/_/de bzhin du sgra yang rkan la sogs pa rnams las 'byung bzhin pa la ni byas pa zhes bya'o/_/de bas na gtan tshigs ming du zad de grub pa ni med
[\[141a.6\]]do/_/'on kyang tshad ma las ming tsam las ma yin te/_mi slu [#]ba'i phyir ro/_/'di'i phyir yang gtan tshigs rnams don med pa yin te/_dam bca' ba'i dus su ni gtan tshigs yod pa ma yin te/_ma skyes pa'i phyir ro/_/de bzhin du gtan tshigs kyis [#]dus su yang [#]dam bca'
[\[141a.7\]]ba yod pa ma yin te/_'gag pa'i chos yod pa'i phyir ro/_/de'i phyir dam bca' ba'i dngos po med pa la 'di gang gi gtan tshigs su 'gyur/_de bzhin du dam bca' ba la cig car med pa'i chos can gyi phyir te/_gang gi tshe yi ge phra yod pa de'i tshe yi ge he [#]dang /_yi ge
[\[141b\]]
[\[141b.1\]]ja yod pa ma yin no/_/de bzhin du dus gcig tu pa yig dang /_ra yig dang /_yi ge a la sogs pa rnams kyang cig car 'byung ba ma yin no/_/gtan tshigs kyi yang [(]yi ga [,]yi ge [)]rnams cig car 'byung ba ma yin no/_/ma skyes pa'i bu'am ma ning pa'i bus bu'i bya ba byed mi nus
[\[141b.2\]]pa de bzhin du gtan tshigs rnams kyang don med do/_/'dir smras pa/_gal te rgyu dang 'bras bu zhes bya ba ma grub mod/_de lta na yang bdag ni grub ste/_de 'grub pa'i rgyu [(]dad [,]dang [)]'bras bu dag kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro zhe na/_smras pa/_rang bzhin brjod par bya'o/_/'dir
[\[141b.3\]]gal te bdag yod na de'i tshe de'i rang bzhin brjod dgos so/_/ci ste shes pa'i rang bzhin yin par smra na ni de'i tshe rtag pa ma yin par 'gyur te/_shes pa ni mi rtag pa yin pa'i phyir ro/_/'dir bum pa'i shes pa 'gags te/_snam bu'i shes pa skyes so/_/ci ste shes pa
[\[141b.4\]]las gzhan yin pa de lta [#]na ni mi shes par 'gyur ro/_/mi shes pa yin na yang sdug bsngal ba dang bde ba med par thal bar 'gyur ro/_/gnyi ga smra ba rnams la ni gnyi ga'i skyon du thal bar 'gyur te/_shes pa sems dang ldan par smra ba rnams kyi bdag med pa kho na yin no/_/
[\[141b.5\]]gang gi tshe bdag sems pa can du skye ba de'i tshe sems pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/de lta na yang bdag med par yang 'gyur te/_sems pa bdag med pa'i phyir ro/_/gal te yang sems pa de nyid dang ldan par 'gyur na ni de'i tshe bdag med pa nyid du yang 'gyur te/_de dang ldan
[\[141b.6\]]pa'i phyir ro/_/'dir smras pa/_bdag yod de bdag gi ba'i dngos po yod pa'i phyir ro/_/'di ltar bdag gis bum pa dang snam bu la sogs pa bkag pa ma [#]yin te/_de ma bkag pa'i phyir bdag yod do zhe na/_smras pa/_gcig nyid la skyon yod do/_/'dir gal te bum
[\[141b.7\]]pa la sogs pa rnams ha sta dang /_kar+Na dang phan [#]bzhin du gcig nyid yin na ni de'i tshe thams cad bum pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro/_/gang dang gang yod pa de ni ming bum pa dang gcig yin no/_/bum pa zhig na thams cad du thams cad 'jig par 'gyur te ha sta zhig na kar+Na
[\[142a\]]
[\[142a.1\]]'jig pa bzhin no/_/phyin ci log par thal bar 'gyur ba dang /_gcig yin pa'i phyir [#]zlos pa'i skyon du yang 'gyur te/_ji ltar ha sta zhes brjod na/_kar+Na dang pa na nyid brjod par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/_yod pa zhes brjod pas bum pa dang gcig nyid brjod par
[\[142a.2\]]'gyur te/_de'i phyir dngos po rnams gcig pa ma yin te/_skyon dang bcas pa'i phyir ro/_/gang dag gi gcig pa nyid de dag la ni skyon 'di yod kyi bdag cag ni gzhan pa nyid du khas len pa'i phyir skyon 'di med do/_/gzhan pa nyid yin na yod pa dang gcig pa dang bum pa
[\[142a.3\]]rnams ma 'dres pa yin te/_rdzas dang /_yon tan dang /_las dang /_spyi dang /_khyad par dang /_'du ba rnams tha dad pa'i phyir ro/_/de la bum pa ni rdzas so/_/gcig pa ni yon tan no/_/yod pa zhes bya ba ni spyi bo'o [#]zhe na/_smras pa/_gzhan nyid na dngos po med pa yin no/_/
