[\[279a.6\]]yang ma yin mi rtag pa yang ma yin pa zhes bya ba de yang rab tu mi 'grub bo/_/gal te gang zhig gang nas 'ongs/_/ci zhig gang du 'gro 'gyur na/_/de phyir de la thog med pas/_/rtag par gyur na de yang med/_/gal te dngos po gang zhig yul gang nas 'ongs shing ci zhig gcig tu gang du 'gro bar 'gyur
[\[279a.7\]]na ni de'i phyir de la thog ma med pas rtag par 'gyur ba zhig na/_shes rab kyis brtsal [#]na dngos po gang zhig yul gang nas 'ongs shing /_ji zhig gcig tu gang 'gro bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dngos po 'ga' yang med pas de'i phyir de la [#]thog ma med pa yang med pas rtag pa ma yin
[\[279b\]]
[\[279b.1\]]no/_/gal te rtag pa 'ga' med na/_/mi rtag gang zhig yin par 'gyur/_/rtag pa dang ni mi rtag dang /_/de gnyis bsal [#]bar gyur pa'o/_/gal te de ltar shes rab kyis brtags na dngos po 'ga' yang med na mi rtag pa gang zhig yin par gyur/_rtag kyang rtag la mi rtag kyang mi
[\[279b.2\]]rtag pa dang /_rtag pa yang ma yin mi rtag pa yang ma yin pa yang gang zhig yin par 'gyur/_de lta bas na sngon gyi mtha' las brtsams pa'i rtag pa dang mi rtag pa la sogs pa bzhi po de dag mi 'thad do/_/da ni/_phyi ma'i mtha' las brtsams pa'i mtha' dang mtha' med pa la sogs pa
[\[279b.3\]]bzhi po de dag ji ltar mi 'thad pa/_de ltar bshad par bya ste/_gal te ji ltar zhe na/_bshad pa/_gal te 'jig rten mtha' yod na/_/'jig rten pha rol ji ltar 'gyur/_/gal te 'jig rten mtha' med na/_/'jig rten pha rol ji ltar 'gyur/_/'jig rten mtha' yod ces bya ba mi
[\[279b.4\]]'thad do[#]/_/ci'i phyir zhe na/_gal te 'jig rten pha rol [#]yod par gyur na/_de'i phyir 'jig rten pha rol yod par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/'jig rten pha rol yang yod pas de'i phyir 'jig rten mtha' yod ces bya ba mi 'thad do[#]/_/'jig rten mtha' med ces bya ba yang mi 'thad do[#]/_/ci'i phyir zhe
[\[279b.5\]]na/_gal te 'jig rten mtha' med par gyur na de'i phyir 'jig rten pha rol med par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/'jig rten pha rol yang yod pas de'i phyir 'jig rten mtha' med ces bya ba yang yod pas de'i phyir 'jig rten mtha' med ces bya ba yang [#]mi 'thad do/_/de gnyis ci'i phyir mi 'thad ce na/_de la
[\[279b.6\]]bshad par bya ste/_gang phyir phung po rnams kyi rgyun/_/'di [#]ni mar me'i 'od dang mtshungs/_/de phyir mtha' yod nyid dang ni/_/mtha' med nyid kyang mi rigs so/_/gang gi phyir phung po rnams kyi rgyun 'di ni mar me'i 'od dang mtshungs par rgyu dang rkyen gyi tshogs pa'i dbang gis 'byung ba de'i phyir 'jig
[\[279b.7\]]rten mtha' yod pa nyid dang /_mtha' med pa nyid ces bya ba yang mi rigs so/_/ci'i phyir mi rigs she na/_de la [#]bshad par bya ste/_gal te snga ma 'jig 'gyur zhing /_/phung po 'di la brten byas nas/_/phung po 'di ni mi 'byung na/_/des na 'jig rten mtha' yod 'gyur/_/gal te snga ma mi
[\[280a\]]
[\[280a.1\]]'jig cing /_/phung po 'di la brten byas nas/_/phung po 'di ni mi 'byung na/_/des na 'jig rten mtha' med 'gyur/_/gal te phung po snga ma rnams 'jig par 'gyur zhing /_phung po 'di dag la brten nas phung po gzhan de dag mi 'byung na ni des na 'jig rten mtha' yod par
[\[280a.2\]]'gyur ba zhig na gang gi phyir de lta ma yin pa de'i phyir 'jig rten mtha' yod ces bya ba mi 'thad do/_/gal te phung po snga ma rnams mi 'jig cing phung po de [#]dag la brten nas phung po phyi ma de dag mi 'byung na ni des na 'jig rten mtha' med par 'gyur ba zhig na/_gang gi phyir de lta ma yin pa de'i phyir
[\[280a.3\]]'jig rten mtha' med pa zhes [#]bya ba yang mi 'thad do/_/slob dpon 'phags pa lhas kyang /_nyan pa po dang mnyan bya dang /_/smra po 'byung [#]ba shin tu dkon/_/de phyir mdor na 'khor ba ni/_/mtha' yod ma yin mtha' med min/_/zhes gsungs so/_/da ni 'jig rten mtha' yod kyang yod la mtha' [#]med kyang
[\[280a.4\]]med ces bya ba de yang mi 'thad de/_ci'i phyir zhe na/_bshad [#]par bya ste/_gal te phyogs gcig mtha' yod la/_/phyogs gcig mtha' ni med gyur na/_/'jig rten mtha' yod mtha' med 'gyur/_/de yang rigs pa ma yin no/_/gal te phyogs gcig mtha' yod par gyur la/_phyogs gcig mtha' med par
[\[280a.5\]]gyur na ni de'i phyir 'jig rten mtha' yod kyang yod la/_mtha' med kyang med par 'gyur ba zhig na/_de lta na dngos po bdag nyid gnyis pa nyid du gyur pa de [#]ni mi 'thad do/_/ji lta bur na nyer len po/_/phyogs gcig rnam par 'jig 'gyur la/_/phyogs gcig rnam par 'jig mi 'gyur/_/de ltar de ni mi
[\[280a.6\]]rigs so/_/ji lta bur na nyer blang ba/_/phyogs gcig rnam par 'jig 'gyur la/_/phyogs gcig rnam par 'jig mi 'gyur/_/de ltar de yang mi rigs so/_/re zhig nye bar len pa po rigs pa gang gis phyogs gcig rnam par 'jig par 'gyur la/_phyogs gcig rnam par 'jig par mi
[\[280a.7\]]'gyur te/_rtag pa dang mi rtag pa nyid med pa'i phyir re zhig de ltar ni [#]mi rigs so/_/nye bar blang ba yang rnam pa gang gis phyogs gcig rnam par 'jig par 'gyur la/_phyogs gcig rnam par 'jig par mi 'gyur te/_rtag pa dang mi rtag pa nyid mi 'thad pa kho na'i phyir de
[\[280b\]]
[\[280b.1\]]ltar yang mi rigs so/_/de ltar gang gi phyir dngos po bdag nyid gnyis pa nyid mi 'thad pa de'i phyir 'jig rten mtha' yod kyang yod la mtha' med kyang med ces bya ba mi 'thad do/_/da ni 'jig rten mtha' yod pa yang ma yin mtha' med pa yang ma yin zhes bya ba yang mi 'thad de/_ci'i phyir
[\[280b.2\]]zhe na/_bshad par bya ste/_gal te mtha' yod mtha' med pa/_/gnyi ga grub par gyur na ni/_/mtha' yod ma yin mtha' med min/_/'grub par 'gyur ba 'dod la rag_/gal te mtha' yod pa dang mtha' med pa zhes bya ba de gnyi ga rab tu grub par gyur na ni de'i phyir mtha' yod pa yang
[\[280b.3\]]ma yin mtha' med pa yang ma yin zhes bya ba 'di rab tu 'grub par 'gyur bar yang 'dod la rag na gang gi phyir mtha' yod pa dang /_mtha' med pa zhes bya ba de [#]gnyis rab tu ma grub pa de'i phyir mtha' yod pa yang ma yin/_mtha' med pa yang ma yin zhes bya ba 'di yang rab tu ma grub bo/_/
[\[280b.4\]]de lta bas na brtag [#]pa 'dis phyi ma'i mtha' las brtsams pa'i mtha' dang mtha' med pa la sogs pa bzhi mi 'thad do/_/yang na dngos po thams cad dag_/stong phyir rtag la sogs lta ba/_/gang du gang la gang dag ni/_/ci'i phyir kun du 'byung bar 'gyur/_/yang na dngos po thams cad stong pa'i phyir/_
[\[280b.5\]]rtag pa la sogs par lta ba dag yul dang dus gang du dngos po gang la/_lta ba gang dag_/rgyu ci'i phyir kun du 'byung bar 'gyur/_/gang gis thugs brtse nyer bzung [#]nas/_/lta ba thams cad spang ba'i phyir/_/dam pa'i chos ni ston mdzad pa/_/gau tam de la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gang gis thugs
[\[280b.6\]]brtse bas nye bar bzung nas lta ba thams cad spang ba'i phyir/_dam pa'i chos bstan par [#]mdzad pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shin tu rmad du byung ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa mtshungs pa med pa gzhal du med pa gdung gau ta ma dang gcig pa de la phyag 'tshal lo/_/lta ba brtag pa zhes bya ba ste rab tu byed pa nyi shu
[\[280b.7\]]bdun pa ste tha ma'o//_//dbu ma rtsa ba'i tshig le'ur byas pa shes rab ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i chos mngon pa rnam par gzhag [#]pa don dam pa'i de kho na yang dag par ston pa/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gsal bar byed pa/_slob dpon bdag nyid chen po 'phags pa klu
[\[281a\]]
[\[281a.1\]]sgrub mi 'phrogs pa'i mkhyen rab dang /_thugs rjer ldan pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa bla na med pa'i tshul rab tu 'byed pa rab tu dga' ba'i sa bsgrubs nas bde ba can gyi zhing du gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams dang ba'i 'od ces bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes
[\[281a.2\]]'byung gnas 'od ces bya bar 'gyur bas mdzad pa/_de'i 'grel pa bud+d+ha pA li ta zhes bya ba theg pa chen po nges pa'i don ston pa/_lta ba ngan pa'i dri ma sel bar byed pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gtan la 'bebs pa/_don dam pa'i bden pa gsal bar byed pa/_slob dpon btsun pa sangs
[\[281a.3\]]rgyas bskyangs 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi bka' grub pa bstan bcos du ma'i rnam par bshad pa mdzad pa/_theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa/_rig sngags 'chang grub pa'i gnas khyad par can du gshegs pas mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA [#]na gar+b+ha dang /_/zhu chen gyi lo
[\[281a.4\]]tsA [#]ba cog ro klu'i rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//_//[{D3843}#]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_swa b+hA [#]wa tra ya pra be sha sA d+ha na[#]/_bod skad du/_rang bzhin gsum la 'jug pa'i sgrub pa/_sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/kun brtags dang ni gzhan dbang
[\[281a.5\]]dang /_/yongs su grub pa nyid kyang ni/_/brtan pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gsum/_/shes bya zab par 'dod pa yin/_/gang snang de ni gzhan dbang yin/_/ji ltar snang ba kun brtags te/_/rkyen la 'jug pa'i [#]dbang phyir dang /_/brtag [#]pa'i dngos po tsam phyir ro/_/de yi snang ba ji bzhin snang /_/brtag [#]tu med
[\[281a.6\]]pa nyid gang ni/_/gzhan du mi 'gyur phyir nyid de/_/yongs grub rang bzhin shes par bya/_/de la ci snang yod min rtog_/ji ltar snang ba gnyis dag gis/_/de yi med nyid gang de yis/_/de ru gnyis med chos nyid gang /_/sems de de ru yod min rtog_/gang phyir de ni brtags pa yin/_/ji ltar don ni brtag [#]byed
[\[281a.7\]]pa/_/de bzhin shin tu ma yin/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dbye ba yis/_/sems de rnam pa gnyis su 'dod/_/kun gzhi [#]rnam par shes gang dang /_/'jug pa shes [#]bya rnams bdun pa'o/_/kun nas nyon mongs bag chags kyi/_/sa bon bsags phyir sems brjod de/_/rnam shes lnga po gzhan ma
[\[281b\]]
[\[281b.1\]]yin/_/sna tshogs rnam pa 'jug phyir ro/_/yang dag ma yin kun rtog gang /_/de ni bsdus par rnam gsum 'dod/_/rnam smin de bzhin mtshan ma can/_/so sor snang ba gzhan ma'o/_/dang po'i rtsa ba'i rnam shes te/_/gang phyir rnam smin bdag nyid de/_/'jug pa'i rnam shes phan tshun mthong /_/mthong bya
[\[281b.2\]]yan lag gnyis 'jug phyir/_/yod med phyir dang gnyis gcig phyir/_/kun nas nyon mongs rnam byang la/_/mtshan nyid dbyer med phyir zab nyid/_/rang bzhin rnams la 'dod pa yin/_/shin tu med pa nyid dag ni/_/gang phyir yod par 'dzin pa la/_/de yis [#]kun brtags rang bzhin ni/_/yod dang med pa'i mtshan
[\[281b.3\]]nyid 'dod/_/'khrul pa'i dngos po [#]yod pa la/_/ji bzhin snang ba yod ma yin/_/gang phyir gzhan dbang de yis ni[#]/_/yod med mtshan nyid par 'dod do/_/gang gis gnyis med nyid du yod/_/gnyis kyi dngos po med pa nyid/_/de yis yongs grub rang bzhin ni/_/yod med mtshan nyid 'dod pa yin/_/brtags pa'i don
[\[281b.4\]]la rnam gnyis phyir/_/de yod ma yin dngos gcig phyir/_/kun brtags rang bzhin byis pa rnams/_/gnyis snang gcig gis bdag gnyis [#]'dod/_/gnyis kyi dngos po snang phyir dang /_/'khrul pa tsam gyis dngos gcig phyir/_/gzhan dbang zhes bya'i rang bzhin ni/_/gnyis dang gcig gi bdag nyid
[\[281b.5\]]'dod/_/gang gis gnyis med nyid du yod/_/gnyis kyi dngos pos med pa nyid/_/de yis yongs grub rang bzhin ni/_/gnyis dang gcig gis bdag gnyis [#]'dod/_/kun brtags dang ni gzhan gyi dbang /_/nyon mongs mtshan nyid shes par bya/_/rnam par byang ba'i mtshan nyid ni/_/yongs su grub par 'dod
[\[281b.6\]]pa yin/_/gnyis kyi rang bzhin med phyir dang /_/de med pa yi rang bzhin phyir/_/rang bzhin yongs grub kun brtags las/_/dbyer med mtshan nyid shes par bya/_/gnyis med rang bzhin nyid phyir dang /_/gnyis ni med pa'i rang bzhin phyir/_/yongs su grub las kun brtags kyang /_/mtshan nyid tha mi dad
[\[281b.7\]]ces bya/_/ji ltar snang ba med phyir dang /_/de bzhin med pa'i rang bzhin phyir/_/yongs grub gzhan dbang rang bzhin las/_/tha mi dad pa'i mtshan nyid yin/_/gnyis med rang bzhin nyid phyir dang /_/ji bzhin snang ba dngos med phyir/_/yongs su grub las gzhan dbang yang /_/dbyer med mtshan nyid shes par bya/_/tha
[\[282a\]]
[\[282a.1\]]snyad gtso bor byas phyir dang /_/de 'jug gtso bor byas pa'i phyir/_/rim pa'i dbye ba'i [#]rang bzhin gyi/_/slob pa'i ched du brjod pa yin/_/tha snyad brda nyid kun brtags dang /_/tha snyad byed pa'i bdag nyid gzhan/_/tha snyad kun nas chad [#]byed pa'i/_/rang bzhin gzhan ma 'dod ma [#]yin/_/sngon du gnyis med
[\[282a.2\]]bdag nyid ni/_/gzhan dbang rab tu 'jug par 'gyur/_/de nas de ru gnyis med ni/_/brtag pa tsam du 'jug pa yin/_/de nas gnyis med dngos po ni/_/de ru yongs grub 'jug pa ste/_/de bzhin de nyid de bzhin du/_/med dang yod ces brjod pa yin/_/rang bzhin gsum ka 'di rnams ni/_/gnyis med brjod med mtshan
[\[282a.3\]]nyid can/_/med phyir de bzhin yod phyir dang /_/de med pa yi rang bzhin phyir/_/rtogs dang ma rtogs rnam rtog [#]dang /_/mngon rtogs 'dzin pa'i dbye ba'i phyir/_/so so re re rang bzhin gsum/_/rnam pa bzhi yis dbye bar 'dod/_/ming ni gnyis thos 'khrul pa dang /_/dbang du nyid ces dbye ba'i phyir/_/mi brjod gnyis med nyon mi
[\[282a.4\]]mongs/_/gcig dang du ma'i dbye phyir ro/_/sgyu [#]mas byas pa'i sngags dbang gis/_/glang chen bdag nyid kyis [#]snang bzhin/_/de ru rnam pa tsam yod de/_/glang chen rnam pa kun du med/_/glang chen kun brtags par [#]bzhin te/_/de yi rnam pa gzhan dbang yin/_/de ru glang chen med pa gang /_/de ni yongs grub 'dod pa
[\[282a.5\]]yin/_/rtsa ba'i [#]sems las gang dag gis/_/de bzhin yod min kun brtags [#]snang /_/gnyis po shin tu med pa ste/_/de ru rnam pa tsam yod do/_/rtsa ba'i rnam shes sngags bzhin du/_/de bzhin nyid 'di shing bzhin 'dod/_/rnam rtog glang chen rnam pa bzhin/_/'dod de glang chen bzhin gnyis so/_/de gnyis
[\[282a.6\]]rtogs [#]pa'i dus su ni/_/mtshan nyid gsum la dus gcig tu/_/yongs su shes dang spong ba dang /_/rim pa ji bzhin thob par 'dod/_/yongs shes 'di ru mi dmigs pa/_/spong mi snang ba 'dod pa yin/_/dmigs pa dag ni mtshan ma ste/_/thob par mngon sum bya ba'ang de/_/gnyis ka [#]la ni mi dmigs pas/_/
[\[282a.7\]]gnyis kyi [#]rnam par rtog par 'gyur/_/yongs grub de yi rnam rtog phyir/_/gnyis ni med par rtogs par 'gyur/_/glang po che ni mi dmigs dang /_/de yi rnam pa'i rnam rtog ste/_/shing dag la ni dmigs pa ni/_/dus gcig sgyu ma la bzhin du/_/gnyen po blo ni sgyur phyir dang /_/blo yis bdag med mthong ba'i
[\[282b\]]
[\[282b.1\]]phyir/_/ye shes gsum la rjes 'jug phyir/_/'bad pa med par thar pa thob/_/sems tsam la ni dmigs pa yis/_/shes bya'i don ni mi dmigs nyid/_/shes bya'i don la dmigs med pas/_/sems ni mi dmigs nyid du 'gyur/_/gnyi ga la ni mi dmigs pas/_/chos kyi dbyings la dmigs pa nyid/_/chos kyi
[\[282b.2\]]dbyings la dmigs pa yis/_/'byor pa nyid la dmigs par 'gyur/_/'byor ba nyid ni thob 'gyur na/_/rang dang gzhan gyi don 'jug phyir/_/sku gsum bdag nyid byang chub ni/_/bla med blo dang ldan pas thob/_/ces bya'o/_/mtshan nyid gsum la 'jug pa slob dpon chen po 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//_
[\[282b.3\]]kha che'i paN+Di ta dge slong zla ba grags pas bsgyur ba'o//[ {D3844}#]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_hasta bA sa [#]nA ma pra ka ra Na/_bod skad du/_cha shas kyi yan lag ces bya ba'i rab tu byed pa/_/bcom ldan 'das ngag gi dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/thag pa la ni sbrul snyam 'dzin/_/thag par mthong na [#]don med do/_/de yi cha mthong
[\[282b.4\]]de la ni/_/sbrul bzhin shes pa 'khrul pa yin/_/brtag pa'i dngos po thams cad la/_/rang gi ngo bo brtags pa na/_/gzhan gyi kun rdzob shes pa yis/_/spyod yul ji snyed brtags [#]pa yin/_/cha med brtag par bya min phyir/_/tha ma [#]yang ni med par mtshungs/_/de phyir mkhas pas 'khrul pa tsam/_/yang dag don du
[\[282b.5\]]min par brtag_/'khrul na de yang ma dag phyir/_/ji ltar snang ba de ltar med/_/don yod ma yin snang ba ni/_/ji ltar de yi bdag nyid 'gyur/_/gang zhig zhib mo'i [#]blo yis ni/_/thams cad brtags pa kho nar shes/_/blo ldan des ni chags la sogs/_/bde bar sbrul gyis skrag bzhin spangs[#]/_/'jig rten pa yi don
[\[282b.6\]]rtogs pas/_/'jig rten bzhin du bsgrub par bya/_/kun nas nyon mongs spang [#]'dod pas/_/dam pa'i don gyis btsal bar bya/_/de ltar rang bzhin yongs shes pa'i/_/rnal 'byor pas ni gzugs sogs la/_/nye bar spyod pas thub pa yi/_/brtul zhugs kyi [#]'bras myur du 'grub[#]/_/cha shas kyi yan
[\[282b.7\]]lag ces bya ba'i rab tu byed pa slob dpon 'phags pa lhas mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrad+d+ha [#]ka ra warma dang /_bod kyi lo tsA ba rin chen bzang pos bsgyur ba'o//[ {D3845}#]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_hasta bA sa [#]nA ma pra ka ra N-i brat+ti[#]/_bod skad du/_cha shas kyi yan lag ces bya ba'i
[\[283a\]]
[\[283a.1\]]rab tu byed pa'i 'grel pa/_'phags pa 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/_/khams gsum pa'i tha snyad tsam la yang dag pa'i don du kun du rtogs pa'i phyir/_de kho na nyid kyi don khong du ma chud pa'i sems can rnams la dngos po'i rang bzhin rab tu dbye ba'i sgo nas/_phyin ci
[\[283a.2\]]ma log pa'i shes pa yang dag par sgrub [#]pa'i phyir 'di brtsams so/_/thag pa la ni sbrul snyam 'dzin/_thag par [#]mthong na don med do/_/'di ni yul ha cang skal ba ma yin pa 'od tsam zhig snang ba zhig na/_thag pa'i gzugs spyi chos can zhig dmigs pa la 'khrul nas/_'di ni sbrul kho na'o zhes nges par 'dzin pa'i ngo
[\[283a.3\]]bo shes pa skye ste/_khyad par rang gi ngo bo khong du ma chud pa'i phyir ro/_/de'i khyad par nges par 'dzin pa na/_don ji lta ba ma yin par kun du rtog pas rab tu spros pa nyid kyi phyir/_shes pa de yang 'khrul pa'i shes pa don med pa kho nar 'gyur ro/_/de yi cha mthong de la yang /_/sbrul bzhin shes pa 'khrul pa
[\[283a.4\]]yin/_/thag pa de la yang cha shas su phye nas brtag [#]pa na/_thag pa'i rang gi ngo bo mi dmigs te/_de ma dmigs na thag par dmigs pa yang sbrul lo snyam pa'i blo bzhin du 'khrul pa tsam 'ba' zhig tu zad do/_/yang ji ltar thag par shes la [#]'khrul pa de bzhin du/_cha shas de yang dum bu dang /_nyag ma
[\[283a.5\]]la sogs pa de dag la ltos pa ni [#]rang gi ngo bo nges par mi 'dzin to/_/de nges par ma zin pas de la dmigs pa'i rnam pa can gyi [#]blo bzhin du 'khrul pa tsam kho na'o/_/brtag [#]pa'i dngos po thams cad la/_/rang gi ngo bo brtags pa na/_/kun rdzob tu ni [#]shes pa yis[#]/_/spyod yul ji snyed brtags pa yin/_/ji
[\[283a.6\]]ltar cha shas la sogs pa'i dbye bas tha dad pa'i thag pa la sogs pa la brtags pa na rang gi ngo bo mi dmigs te/_thag pa la sogs pa'i blo yang sbrul lo snyam pa'i blo bzhin du 'khrul pa yin pa de bzhin du/_ngos cha la sogs pa la ltos nas yod pa rdza ma dang phor bu la sogs tha snyad pa'i shes pa'i
[\[283a.7\]]spyod yul ji snyed pa thams cad brtags [#]pa yod pa kho na yin te/_de dag mthar rab tu phye ba na/_re zhig bum pa la sogs pa ni tha snyad du brtags [#]pa kho na yin no/_/gzhan du zhes bya ba ni/_don dam pa nyid las so/_/cha med brtag par bya min phyir/_tha ma yang ni med par mtshungs/_gang yang brtag [# ]
[\[283b\]]
[\[283b.1\]]pa'i dngos po thams cad kyi tha ma rdul phra rab kyi rdzas cha med pa gcig pu de yang /_brtag par bya ba ma yin pa'i rang gi ngo bos dmigs pa [#]mi rung ba'i phyir/_nam mkha'i me tog gi phreng ba dang /_ri bong gi rwa la sogs pa dang mtshungs pas/_de yang dngos po med pa nyid du 'grub bo/_/ci ste yang ji ltar na brtag par bya
[\[283b.2\]]ba ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid gtan tshigs [#]des/_rdul phra rab kyi rdzas yod pa nyid gcig pa nyid du med do zhes shes par nus she na/_gang gi phyir yod na ni phyogs cha tha dad pa'i phyir/_dper na yod pa bum pa dang /_snam bu dang shing rta la sogs pa'i rdzas rnams ni/_shar dang nub dang steng dang 'og la sogs pa'i
[\[283b.3\]]phyogs cha tha dad pa'i phyir/_cha shas tha dad pa dag snang ba ltar gal te rdul phra rab kyi rdzas kyang yod par gyur na/_gdon mi za bar phyogs cha tha dad pa'i phyir shar dang nub dang byang dang steng la sogs pa'i cha shas khas blang bar bya'o/_/cha shas tha dad pa yin na ni rdul phra rab kyi rdzas gcig tu mi 'grub
[\[283b.4\]]bo/_/rdzas kyi dbye ba mang po snang ba'i phyir gcig pa nyid ni yod pa ma yin te/_rdul phra rab mi dmigs pas rdul phra rab kyi rdzas su smra ba 'di thong shig_/de phyir mkhas pas 'khrul pa tsam/_/yang dag don du min par brtag_/gang gi phyir de ltar khams gsum la [#]'khrul pa tsam yin pa de'i
[\[283b.5\]]phyir/_mkhas pa legs pa thob par 'dod pas 'di la yang dag pa'i don du brtag par mi bya'o/_/gal te 'di snyam du bum pa la sogs pa phyi rol gyi dngos po de dag ni/_ngo bo nyid mi rtog pa'i phyir med pa las kun brtags pas [#]yin pa bden no/_/de dag la dmigs pa'i rnam pa can gyi
[\[283b.6\]]'khrul pa tsam 'di yod [#]de/_dper na sgyu ma dang dri za'i grong khyer [#]la sogs pa med kyang /_de dag la dmigs pa'i rnam pa can gyi shes pa lta bu'o zhes bya bar 'dod do zhes/_'khrul na de yang ma dag phyir/_/ji ltar snang ba de ltar med/_/don yod ma yin snang ba ni/_/ji ltar de yi bdag
[\[283b.7\]]nyid 'gyur/_/'khrul pa de yang rdzas kyi rang gi ngo bos [#]shes pa yin na/_rdzas de ni ngo bo nyid de lta bur yod pa ma yin te/_don de med na yang rang gi ngo bos ni nus pa med pas ma dag par 'gyur ro/_/ma dag pa'i phyir 'khrul pa'i ngo bo nyid de lta bur yod do zhes bya bar ji lta bur shes/_ji
[\[284a\]]
[\[284a.1\]]ltar 'jig rten na yang sa bon la sogs pa skyed [#]par byed pa med na/_skyed par byed pa [#]myu gu la sogs pa [#]yod do zhes bya ba'i chos de lta bu yang ma mthong ngo /_/de nyid kyi phyir sgyu ma lta bu 'dod pa yang ma grub par nges pa bshad pa yin no/_/gang zhig zhib mo'i blo yis ni/_/thams cad brtags pa kho nar
[\[284a.2\]]shes/_/blo ldan de yis chags la sogs/_/bde bar sbrul gyis skrag bzhin [#]spong /_/ji skad bshad pa'i rnam par [#]brtags pa tsam du yod pa'i khams gsum [#]'di la gang zhig bum pa la sogs pa rags pa'i blo gsal [#]te/_zhib mo'i blos rdzas med pa tha snyad tsam yin par nges par 'dzin pa de ni/_ji ltar thag pa la sbrul lo snyam pa'i
[\[284a.3\]]shes pas kun nas bslang [#]ba'i 'jigs pa de'i khyad par rnam par dpyad [#]nas thag par nges pa na/_de'i sbrul gyis [#]skrag pa med pa de bzhin du/_'dod chags la sogs pa de skyed [#]par byed pa'i dngos po dag la yongs su brtags [#]pa des kyang /_'dod chags la sogs pa nyon mongs pa'i dra ba rnams bde bar dka' ba
[\[284a.4\]]med par ring por mi thogs pa kho nar spong bar 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten pa yi don rtogs pas/_/'jig rten bzhin du bsgrub par bya/_/kun nas nyon mongs spong 'dod pas/_/dam pa'i don gyis btsal bar byas[#]/_/ji ltar 'jig rten pa dag bum pa la sogs pa'i don la dngos por rtog pas/_'di bum pa'o/_/snam bu'o/_/shing
[\[284a.5\]]rta'o zhes tha snyad 'dogs pa de bzhin du sngon gyi bsgrub pas [#]tha snyad du bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu 'dod chags la sogs pa nyon mongs pa spong bar 'dod pa rnams kyis/_ji skad bshad pa'i don dam pa'i mtshan nyid kyis dngos po rnams yongs su btsal bar bya ste/_de ltar dngos po rnams yongs su tshol ba nas[#]/_de'i 'dod
[\[284a.6\]]chags la sogs pa/_nyon mongs pa'i dra ba phyis mi skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de ltar rang bzhin yongs shes pa'i/_/rnal 'byor pas ni gzugs sogs la/_/nye bar spyod pas thub pa yi[#]/_/brtul zhugs kyis [#]'bras myur du 'grub/_/ji skad du bshad pa'i rigs pas/_de kho na nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa 'dod pa'i
[\[284a.7\]]yon tan rnams la mngon du spyod pa'i [#]rdo rje 'dzin gyi brtul zhugs kyi [#]zung du 'jug pa'i sku 'grub pa yin no/_/[#]cha shas kyi yan lag ces bya ba'i rab tu byed pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon 'phags pa lhas mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrad+d+ha ka ra warma dang /_bod kyi lo tsA ba rin chen bzang pos bsgyur ba'o//_//[ #]
